Name: Potion of Climbing
Description: When you drink this potiona445 you gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour. During this timea445 you have advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks you make to climb. The potion is separated into browna445 silvera445 and gray layers resembling bands of stone. Shaking the bottle fails to mix the colors.

Name: Potion of Healing
Description: You regain 2d4 + 2 hit points when you drink this potion. The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

Name: Bottled Breath
Description: This bottle contains a breath of elemental air. When you inhale ita445 you either exhale it or hold it.a446If you exhale the breatha445 you gain the effect of the gust of wind spell. If you hold the breatha445 you don't need to breathe for 1 houra445 though you can end this benefit early (for examplea445 to speak). Ending it early doesn't give you the benefit of exhaling the breath.

Name: Oil of Slipperiness
Description: This sticky black unguent is thick and heavy in the containera445 but it flows quickly when poured. The oil can cover a Medium or smaller creaturea445 along with the equipment it's wearing and carrying (one additional vial is required for each size category above Medium). Applying the oil takes 10 minutes. The affected creature then gains the effect of a freedom of movement spell for 8 hours.a446Alternativelya445 the oil can be poured on the ground as an actiona445 where it covers a 10-foot squarea445 duplicating the effect of the grease spell in that area for 8 hours.

Name: Philter of Love
Description: The next time you see a creature within 10 minutes after drinking this philtera445 you become charmed by that creature for 1 hour. If the creature is of a species and gender you are normally attracted toa445 you regard it as your true love while you are charmed. This potion's rose-hueda445 effervescent liquid contains one easy-to-miss bubble shaped like a heart.

Name: Potion of Animal Friendship
Description: When you drink this potiona445 you can cast the animal friendship spell (save DC 13) for 1 hour at will. Agitating this muddy liquid brings little bits into view: a fish scalea445 a hummingbird tonguea445 a cat clawa445 or a squirrel hair.

Name: Potion of Fire Breath
Description: After drinking this potiona445 you can use a bonus action to exhale fire at a target within 30 feet of you. The target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throwa445 taking 4d6 fire damage on a failed savea445 or half as much damage on a successful one. The effect ends after you exhale the fire three times or when 1 hour has passed. This potion's orange liquid flickersa445 and smoke fills the top of the container and wafts out whenever it is opened.

Name: Potion of Giant’s Strength (Hill)
Description: When you drink this potiona445 your Strength score changes to 21 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.a446This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a hill giant.

Name: Potion of Growth
Description: When you drink this potiona445 you gain the enlarge effect of the enlarge/reduce spell for 1d4 hours (no concentration required). The red in the potion's liquid continuously expands from a tiny bead to color the clear liquid around it and then contracts. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.

Name: Potion of Greater Healing
Description: You regain 4d4 + 4 hit points when you drink this potion. The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

Name: Potion of Poison
Description: This concoction looksa445 smellsa445 and tastes like a potion of healing or other beneficial potion. Howevera445 it is actually poison masked by illusion magic. An identify spell reveals its true nature.a446If you drink ita445 you take 3d6 poison damagea445 and you must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. At the start of each of your turns while you are poisoned in this waya445 you take 3d6 poison damage. At the end of each of your turnsa445 you can repeat the saving throw. On a successful savea445 the poison damage you take on your subsequent turns decreases by 1d6. The poison ends when the damage decreases to 0.

Name: Potion of Resistance
Description: When you drink this potiona445 you gain resistance to acida445 colda445 firea445 forcea445 lightninga445 necrotica445 poisona445 psychica445 radianta445 or thunder damage for 1 hour depending on which potion of resistance you drink.

Name: Potion of Water Breathing
Description: You can breathe underwater for 1 hour after drinking this potion. Its cloudy green fluid smells of the sea and has a jellyfish-like bubble floating in it.

Name: Elixir of Health
Description: When you drink this potiona445 it cures any disease afflicting youa445 and it removes the blindeda445 deafeneda445 paralyzeda445 and poisoned conditions. The clear red liquid has tiny bubbles of light in it.

Name: Oil of Etherealness
Description: Beads of this cloudy gray oil form on the outside of its container and quickly evaporate. The oil can cover a Medium or smaller creaturea445 along with the equipment it's wearing and carrying (one additional vial is required for each size category above Medium). Applying the oil takes 10 minutes. The affected creature then gains the effect of the etherealness spell for 1 hour.

Name: Potion of Clairvoyance
Description: When you drink this potiona445 you gain the effect of the clairvoyance spell. An eyeball bobs in this yellowish liquid but vanishes when the potion is opened.

Name: Potion of Diminution
Description: When you drink this potiona445 you gain the reduce effect of the enlarge/reduce spell for 1d4 hours (no concentration required). The red in the potion's liquid continuously contracts to a tiny bead and then expands to color the clear liquid around it. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.

Name: Potion of Gaseous Form
Description: When you drink this potiona445 you gain the effect of the gaseous form spell for 1 hour (no concentration required) or until you end the effect as a bonus action. This potion's container seems to hold fog that moves and pours like water.

Name: Potion of Giant’s Strength (Frost/Stone)
Description: When you drink this potiona445 your Strength score changes to 23 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.a446This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a frost giant.

Name: Potion of Giant’s Strength (Fire)
Description: When you drink this potiona445 your Strength score changes to 25 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.a446This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a fire giant.

Name: Potion of Superior Healing
Description: You regain 8d4 + 8 hit points when you drink this potion. The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

Name: Potion of Heroism
Description: For 1 hour after drinking ita445 you gain 10 temporary hit points that last for 1 hour. For the same durationa445 you are under the effect of the bless spell (no concentration required). This blue potion bubbles and steams as if boiling.

Name: Potion of Invulnerability
Description: For 1 minute after you drink this potiona445 you have resistance to all damage. The potion's syrupy liquid looks like liquefied iron.

Name: Potion of Mind Control (Beast)
Description: When you drink a potion of mind controla445 you can cast a dominate spell (save DC 15) on a specific creature if you do so before the end of your next turn. If you don'ta445 the potion is wasted.a446A potion of mind control produces the effect of a dominate beast spell. If the target's initial saving throw failsa445 the effect lasts for 1 houra445 with no concentration required on your part. The charmed creature has disadvantage on new saving throws to break the effect during this time.

Name: Potion of Mind Control (Human)
Description: When you drink a potion of mind controla445 you can cast a dominate spell (save DC 15) on a specific creature if you do so before the end of your next turn. If you don'ta445 the potion is wasted.a446A potion of mind control produces the effect of a dominate person spell. If the target's initial saving throw failsa445 the effect lasts for 1 houra445 with no concentration required on your part. The charmed creature has disadvantage on new saving throws to break the effect during this time.

Name: Potion of Mind Reading
Description: When you drink this potiona445 you gain the effect of the detect thoughts spell (save DC 13). The potion's densea445 purple liquid has an ovoid cloud of pink floating in it.

Name: Oil of Sharpness
Description: This cleara445 gelatinous oil sparkles with tinya445 ultrathin silver shards. The oil can coat one slashing or piercing weapon or up to 5 pieces of slashing or piercing ammunition. Applying the oil takes 1 minute. For 1 houra445 the coated item is magical and has a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Name: Potion of Flying
Description: When you drink this potiona445 you gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour and can hover. If you're in the air when the potion wears offa445 you fall unless you have some other means of staying aloft. This potion's clear liquid floats at the top of its container and has cloudy white impurities drifting in it.

Name: Potion of Giant’s Strength (Cloud)
Description: When you drink this potiona445 your Strength score changes to 27 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.a446This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a cloud giant.

Name: Potion of Supreme Healing
Description: You regain 10d4 + 20 hit points when you drink this potion. The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

Name: Potion of Invisibility
Description: This potion's container looks empty but feels as though it holds liquid. When you drink ita445 you become invisible for 1 hour. Anything you wear or carry is invisible with you. The effect ends early if you attack or cast a spell.

Name: Potion of Longevity
Description: When you drink this potiona445 your physical age is reduced by 1d6 + 6 yearsa445 to a minimum of 13 years. Each time you subsequently drink a potion of longevitya445 there is 10 percent cumulative chance that you instead age by 1d6 + 6 years. Suspended in this amber liquid are a scorpion's taila445 an adder's fanga445 a dead spidera445 and a tiny heart thata445 against all reasona445 is still beating. These ingredients vanish when the potion is opened.

Name: Potion of Mind Control (Monster)
Description: When you drink a potion of mind controla445 you can cast a dominate spell (save DC 15) on a specific creature if you do so before the end of your next turn. If you don'ta445 the potion is wasted.a446A potion of mind control produces the effect of a dominate monster spell. If the target's initial saving throw failsa445 the effect lasts for 1 houra445 with no concentration required on your part. The charmed creature has disadvantage on new saving throws to break the effect during this time.

Name: Potion of Speed
Description: When you drink this potiona445 you gain the effect of the haste spell for 1 minute (no concentration required). The potion's yellow fluid is streaked with black and swirl on its own.

Name: Potion of Vitality
Description: When you drink this potiona445 it removes any exhaustion you are suffering and cures any disease or poison affecting you. For the next 24 hoursa445 you regain the maximum number of hit points for any Hit Die you spend. The potion's crimson liquid regularly pulses with dull lighta445 calling to mind a heartbeat.

Name: Potion of Giant’s Size
Description: When you drink this potiona445 you become Huge for 24 hours if you are Medium or smallera445 otherwise the potion does nothing. For that durationa445 your Strength becomes 25a445 if it isn't already highera445 and your hit point maximum is doubled (your current hit points are doubled when you drink the potion). In additiona445 the reach of your melee attacks increases by 5 feet.a446Everything you are carrying and wearing also increases in size for the duration. When rolling damage for weapons enlarged in this mannera445 roll three times the normal number of dice; for examplea445 an enlarged longsword would deal 3d8 slashing damage (instead of1d8)a445 or 3d10 slashing damage (instead of 1d10) when used with two hands.a446When the effect endsa445 any hit points you have above your hit point maximum become temporary hit points. This potion is a pale white liquid made from the tongue of a giant clama445 with a pungent aroma akin to that of rotting algae. It tastes sweeta445 howevera445 when consumed.

Name: Potion of Giant Strength (Storm)
Description: When you drink this potiona445 your Strength score changes to 29 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.a446This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a storm giant.

Name: Spell Scroll Lv 0
Description: A spell scroll bears the words of a single spella445 written as a mystical cipher. If the spell is on your class's spell lista445 you can read the scroll and cast its spell without having to provide any of the spell's components. Otherwisea445 the scroll is unintelligible. Casting the spell by reading the scroll requires the spell's normal casting time. Once the spell is casta445 the words on the scroll fadea445 and it crumbles to dust. If the casting is interrupteda445 the scroll is not lost.a446If the spell is on your class's spell list but of a higher level than you can normally casta445 you must make an ability check using your spellcasting ability to determine whether you cast it successfully. The DC is 10. On a failed checka445 the spell disappears from the scroll with no other effect.a446Once the spell is casta445 the words on the scroll fadea445 and the scroll itself crumbles to dust.a446A spell cast from this scroll has a save DC of 13 and an attack bonus of +5.

Name: Spell Scroll Lv 1
Description: A spell scroll bears the words of a single spella445 written as a mystical cipher. If the spell is on your class's spell lista445 you can read the scroll and cast its spell without having to provide any of the spell's components. Otherwisea445 the scroll is unintelligible. Casting the spell by reading the scroll requires the spell's normal casting time. Once the spell is casta445 the words on the scroll fadea445 and it crumbles to dust. If the casting is interrupteda445 the scroll is not lost.a446If the spell is on your class's spell list but of a higher level than you can normally casta445 you must make an ability check using your spellcasting ability to determine whether you cast it successfully. The DC is 11. On a failed checka445 the spell disappears from the scroll with no other effect.a446Once the spell is casta445 the words on the scroll fadea445 and the scroll itself crumbles to dust.a446A spell cast from this scroll has a save DC of 13 and an attack bonus of +5.a446A wizard spell on a spell scroll can be copied just as spells in spellbooks can be copied. When a spell is copied from a spell scrolla445 the copier must succeed on a DC 11 Intelligence (Arcana) check. If the check succeedsa445 the spell is successfully copied. Whether the check succeeds or failsa445 the spell scroll is destroyed.

Name: Spell Gem Lv 0
Description: An obsidian spell gem can contain one cantrip from any class's spell list. You become aware of the spell when you learn the gem's properties. While holding the gema445 you can cast the spell from it as an action if you know the spell or if the spell is on your class's spell list. Doing so doesn't require any componentsa445 and doesn't require attunement. The spell then disappears from the gem.a446An obsidian spell gem can only store cantrips. Cantrips cast from the spell gem have a save DC of 13 and an attack bonus of +5.a446You can imbue the gem with a spell if you're attuned to it and it's empty. To do soa445 you cast the spell while holding the gem. The spell is stored in the gem instead of having any effect. Casting the spell must require either 1 action or 1 minute or longera445 and the spell's level must be no higher than the gem's maximum. IF the spell belongs to the school of abjuration and requires material components that are consumeda445 you must provide thema445 but they can be worth half as much as normal.a446Once imbued with a spella445 the gem can't be imbued again until the next dawn.a446Deep gnomes created these magic gemstones and keep the creation process a secret.

Spells cast from the spell gem have a save DC of 17 and an attack bonus of +9.a446You can imbue the gem with a spell if you're attuned to it and it's empty. To do soa445 you cast the spell while holding the gem. The spell is stored in the gem instead of having any effect. Casting the spell must require either 1 action or 1 minute or longera445 and the spell's level must be no higher than the gem's maximum. IF the spell belongs to the school of abjuration and requires material components that are consumeda445 you must provide thema445 but they can be worth half as much as normal.a446Once imbued with a spella445 the gem can't be imbued again until the next dawn.a446Deep gnomes created these magic gemstones and keep the creation process a secret.

Description: A topaz spell gem can contain one spell from any class's spell list. You become aware of the spell when you learn the gem's properties. While holding the gema445 you can cast the spell from it as an action if you know the spell or if the spell is on your class's spell list. Doing so doesn't require any componentsa445 and doesn't require attunement. The spell then disappears from the gem.a446A topaz spell gem can store up to 6th level spells. To do soa445 you cast the spell while holding the gem. The spell is stored in the gem instead of having any effect. Description: A diamond spell gem can contain one spell from any class's spell list. You become aware of the spell when you learn the gem's properties. Casting the spell must require either 1 action or 1 minute or longera445 and the spell's level must be no higher than the gem's maximum. IF the spell belongs to the school of abjuration and requires material components that are consumeda445 you must provide thema445 but they can be worth half as much as normal.a446Once imbued with a spella445 the gem can't be imbued again until the next dawn.a446Deep gnomes created these magic gemstones and keep the creation process a secret.

Name: Veteran’s Cane
Description: When you grasp this walking cane and use a bonus action to speak the command worda445 it transforms into an ordinary longsword and ceases to be magical.

Name: Blood Spear
Description: Kavan was a ruthless chieftain whose tribe lived in the Balinok Mountains centuries before the arrival of Strahd von Zarovich. Although he was very much alivea445 Kavan had some traits in common with vampires: he slept during the day and hunted at nighta445 he drank the blood of his preya445 and he lived underground. In battlea445 he wielded a spear stained with blood. His was the first blood speara445 a weapon that drains life from those it kills and transfers that life to its wieldera445 imbuing that individual with the stamina to keep fighting.a446When you hit with a melee attack using this magic spear and reduce the target to 0 hit pointsa445 you gain 2d6 temporary hit points.a446Any creature can wield the speara445 but only the character chosen by Kavan to wield it gains a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.a446Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown propertya445 you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapona445 you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For examplea445 if you throw a handaxea445 you use your Strengtha445 but if you throw a daggera445 you can use either your Strength or your Dexteritya445 since the dagger has the finesse property.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Javelin of Lightning
Description: This javelin is a magic weapon. When you hurl it and speak its command worda445 it transforms into a bolt of lightninga445 forming a line 5 feet wide that extends out from you to a target within 120 feet. Each creature in the line excluding you and the target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throwa445 taking 4d6 lightning damage on a failed savea445 and half as much damage on a successful one. The lightning bolt turns back into a javelin when it reaches the target. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hita445 the target takes damage from the javelin plus 4d6 lightning damage.a446The javelin's property can't be used again until the next dawn. In the meantimea445 the javelin can still be used as a magic weapon.a446Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown propertya445 you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapona445 you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For examplea445 if you throw a handaxea445 you use your Strengtha445 but if you throw a daggera445 you can use either your Strength or your Dexteritya445 since the dagger has the finesse property.

Name: Seeker Dart
Description: This small dart is decorated with designs like windy spirals that span the length of its shaft.a446When you whisper the word seek and hurl this darta445 it seeks out a target of your choice within 120 feet of you. You must have seen the target beforea445 but you don't need to see it now. If the target isn't within range or if there is no clear path to ita445 the dart falls to the grounda445 its magic spent and wasted. Otherwisea445 elemental winds guide the dart instantly through the air to the target. The dart can pass though openings as narrow as 1 inch wide and can change direction to fly around corners.a446When the dart reaches its targeta445 the target must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d4 piercing damage and 3d4 lightning damage. The dart's magic is then spenta445 and it becomes an ordinary dart.a446Range. A weapon that can be used to make a ranged attack has a range shown in parentheses after the ammunition or thrown property. The range lists two numbers. The first is the weapon's normal range in feeta445 and the second indicates the weapon's maximum range. When attacking a target beyond normal rangea445 you have disadvantage on the attack roll. You can't attack a target beyond the weapon's long range.a446Finesse. When making an attack with a finesse weapona445 you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.a446Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown propertya445 you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapona445 you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For examplea445 if you throw a handaxea445 you use your Strengtha445 but if you throw a daggera445 you can use either your Strength or your Dexteritya445 since the dagger has the finesse property.

Name: Shatterspike
Description: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. If it hits an objecta445 the hit is automatically a critical hita445 and it can deal bludgeoning or slashing damage to the object (your choice). Furthera445 damage from nonmagical sources can't harm the weapon.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Storm Boomerang
Description: This boomerang is a ranged weapon carved from griffon bone and etched with the symbol of elemental air. When throwna445 it has a range of 60/120 feeta445 and any creature that is proficient with the javelin is also proficient with this weapon. On a hita445 the boomerang deals 1d4 bludgeoning damage and 3d4 thunder damagea445 and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn. On a missa445 the boomerang returns to the thrower's hand.a446Once the boomerang deals thunder damage to a targeta445 the weapon loses its ability to deal thunder damage and its ability to stun a target. These properties return after the boomerang spends at least 1 hour inside an elemental air node.a446Range. A weapon that can be used to make a ranged attack has a range shown in parentheses after the ammunition or thrown property. The range lists two numbers. The first is the weapon's normal range in feeta445 and the second indicates the weapon's maximum range. When attacking a target beyond normal rangea445 you have disadvantage on the attack roll. You can't attack a target beyond the weapon's long range.

Name: Sword of Vengeance
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.a446Curse. This sword is cursed and possessed by a vengeful spirit. Becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. As long as you remain curseda445 you are unwilling to part with the sworda445 keeping it on your person at all times. While attuned to this weapona445 you have disadvantage on attack rolls made with weapons other than this one.a446In additiona445 while the sword is on your persona445 you must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw whenever you take damage in combat. On a failed save you must attack the creature that damaged you until you drop to 0 hit points or it doesa445 or until you can't reach the creature to make a melee attack against it.a446You can break the curse in the usual ways. Alternativelya445 casting banishment on the sword forces the vengeful spirit to leave it. The sword then becomes a +1 weapon with no other properties.

Name: Trident of Fish Command
Description: This trident is a magic weapon. It has 3 charges. While you carry ita445 you can use an action and expend 1 charge to cast dominate beast (save DC 15) from it on a beast that has an innate swimming speed. The trident regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.a446Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown propertya445 you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapona445 you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For examplea445 if you throw a handaxea445 you use your Strengtha445 but if you throw a daggera445 you can use either your Strength or your Dexteritya445 since the dagger has the finesse property.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Weapon of Warning
Description: This magic weapon warns you of danger. While the weapon is on your persona445 you have advantage on initiative rolls. In additiona445 you and any of your companions within 30 feet of you can't be surpriseda445 except when incapacitated by something other than nonmagical sleep. The weapon magically awakens you and your companions within range if any of you are sleeping naturally when combat begins.

Name: Berserker Axe
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. In addition  while you are attuned to this weapon  your hit point maximum increases by 1 for each level you have attained. Curse. This axe is cursed  and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. As long as you remain cursed  you are unwilling to part with the axe  keeping it within reach at all times. You also have disadvantage on attack rolls with weapons other than this one  unless no foe is within 60 feet of you that you can see or hear. Whenever a hostile creature damages you while the axe is in your possession  you must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or go berserk. While berserk  you must use your action each round to attack the creature nearest to you with the axe. If you can make extra attacks as part of the Attack action  you use those extra attacks  moving to attack the next nearest creature after you fell your current target. If you have multiple possible targets  you attack one at random. You are berserk until you start your turn with no creatures within 60 feet of you that you can see or hear.

Name: Dagger of Venom
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.a446You can use an action to cause thicka445 black poison to coat the blade. The poison remains for 1 minute or until an attack using this weapon hits a creature. That creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 2d10 poison damage and become poisoned for 1 minute. The dagger can't be used this way again until the next dawn.a446Finesse. When making an attack with a finesse weapona445 you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.a446Light. A light weapon is small and easy to handlea445 making it ideal for use when fighting with two weapons.a446Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown propertya445 you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapona445 you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For examplea445 if you throw a handaxea445 you use your Strengtha445 but if you throw a daggera445 you can use either your Strength or your Dexteritya445 since the dagger has the finesse property.

Name: Dragon Slayer
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.a446When you hit a dragon with this weapona445 the dragon takes an extra 3d6 damage of the weapon's type. For the purpose of this weapona445 dragon refers to any creature with the dragon typea445 including dragon turtles and wyverns.

Name: Dragontooth Dagger
Description: A dagger fashioned from the tooth of a dragon. While the blade is obviously a fang or predator's tootha445 the handle is leather wrapped around the root of the tootha445 and there is no crossguard.a446You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. On a hit with this weapona445 the target takes an extra 1d6 acid damage.a446Draconic Potency. Against enemies of the Cult of the Dragona445 the dagger's bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to 2a445 and the extra acid damage increases to 2d6.a446Finesse. When making an attack with a finesse weapona445 you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.a446Light. A light weapon is small and easy to handlea445 making it ideal for use when fighting with two weapons.a446Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown propertya445 you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapona445 you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For examplea445 if you throw a handaxea445 you use your Strengtha445 but if you throw a daggera445 you can use either your Strength or your Dexteritya445 since the dagger has the finesse property.

Name: Flametongue
Description: You can use a bonus action to speak this magic sword's command worda445 causing flames to erupt from the blade. These flames shed bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet. While the sword is ablazea445 it deals an extra 2d6 fire damage to any target it hits. The flames last until you use a bonus action to speak the command word again or until you drop or sheathe the sword.

Name: Giant Slayer
Type: Longsword  Shortsword  Rapier  Scimitar  Double-Scimitar  Handaxe  Battleaxe  Greataxe
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.a446When you hit a giant with ita445 the giant takes an extra 2d6 damage of the weapon's type and must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or fall prone. For the purpose of this weapona445 giant refers to any creature with the giant typea445 including ettins and trolls.

Name: Mace of Disruption
Description: When you hit a fiend or an undead with this magic weapona445 that creature takes an extra 2d6 radiant damage. If the target has 25 hit points or fewer after taking this damagea445 it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be destroyed. On a successful savea445 the creature becomes frightened of you until the end of your next turn.a446While you hold this weapona445 it sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

Name: Mace of Smiting
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. The bonus increases to +3 when you use the mace to attack a construct.a446When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapona445 the target takes an extra 7 bludgeoning damagea445 or an extra 14 bludgeoning damage if it's a construct. If a construct has 25 hit points or fewer after taking this damagea445 it is destroyed.

Name: Mace of Terror
Description: This magic weapon has 3 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action and expend 1 charge to release a wave of terror. Each creature of your choice in a 30-foot radius extending from you must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of you for 1 minute. While it is frightened in this waya445 a creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it cana445 and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you. It also can't take reactions. For its action it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If it has nowhere it can movea445 the creature can use the Dodge action. At the end of each of its turnsa445 a creature can repeat the saving throwa445 ending the effect on itself on a success.

Name: Sun Blade
Description: This item appears to be a longsword hilt. While grasping the hilta445 you can use a bonus action to cause a blade of pure radiance to spring into existencea445 or make the blade disappear. While the blade existsa445 this magic longsword has the finesse property. If you are proficient with shortswords or longswordsa445 you are proficient with the sun blade.a446You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapona445 which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage. When you hit an undead with ita445 that target takes an extra 1d8 radiant damage.a446The sword's luminous blade emits bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The light is sunlight. While the blade persistsa445 you can use an action to expand or reduce its radius of bright and dim light by 5 feet eacha445 to a maximum of 30 feet each or a minimum of 10 feet each.a446Finesse. When making an attack with a finesse weapona445 you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Sunforger
Description: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.a446As an actiona445 you can hurl the weapon up to 120 feet to a point you can see. When it reaches that pointa445 the weapon vanishes in an explosiona445 and each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throwa445 taking 6d6 fire damage on a failed savea445 or half as much damage on a successful one. Afterwarda445 you can use an action to cause the weapon to reappear in your empty hand. You can't cause it to explode again until you finish a short or long rest.a446If you don't call the weapon back to your handa445 it reappears at the point where it exploded when you are no longer attuned to it or when 24 hours have passed.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Sword of Life-Stealing
Description: When you attack a creature with this magic weapon and roll a 20 on the attack rolla445 that target takes an extra 10 necrotic damage if it isn't a construct or an undead. You also gain 10 temporary hit points.a446Note: According to the SRDa445 it is an extra 3d6 necrotic damage.

Name: Sword of Sharpness
Description: When you attack an object with this magic sword and hita445 maximize your weapon damage dice against the target.a446When you attack a creature with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack rolla445 that target takes an extra 14 slashing damage. Then roll another d20. If you roll a 20a445 you lop off one of the target's limbsa445 with the effect of such loss determined by the DM. If the creature has no limb to severa445 you lop off a portion of its body instead.a446Note: According to the SRDa445 it is an extra 4d6 slashing damagea445 although this is incorrect.a446In additiona445 you can speak the sword's command to cause the blade to shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. Speaking the command word again or sheathing the sword puts out the light.

Name: Sword of Wounding
Description: Hit points lost to this weapon's damage can be regained only through a short or long resta445 rather than by regenerationa445 magica445 or any other means.a446Once per turna445 when you hit a creature with an attack using this magic weapona445 you can wound the target. At the start of each of the wounded creature's turnsa445 it takes 1d4 necrotic damage for each time you've wounded ita445 and it can then make a DC 15 Constitution saving throwa445 ending the effect of all such wounds on itself on a success. Alternativelya445 the wounded creaturea445 or a creature within 5 feet of ita445 can use an action to make a DC 15 Wisdom (Medicine) checka445 ending the effect of such wounds on it on a success.

Name: Vicious Weapon
Description: When you roll a 20 with this magic weapona445 the target takes an extra 7 damage of the weapon's type.a446Note: According to the SRDa445 it is an extra 2d6 damage.

Name: Dancing Sword
Description: You can use a bonus action to toss this magic sword into the air and speak the command word. When you do soa445 the sword begins to hovera445 flies up to 30 feeta445 and attacks one creature of your choice within 5 feet of it. The sword uses your attack roll and ability score modifier to damage rolls.a446While the sword hoversa445 you can use a bonus action to cause it to fly up to 30 feet to another spot within 30 feet of you. As part of the same bonus actiona445 you can cause the sword to attack one creature within 5 feet of it.a446After the hovering sword attacks for the fourth timea445 it flies up to 30 feet and tries to return to your hand. If you have no hand freea445 it falls to the ground at your feet. If the sword has no unobstructed path to youa445 it moves as close to you as it can and then falls to the ground. It also ceases to hover if you grasp it or move more than 30 feet away from it.

Name: Dwarven Thrower
Description: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. It has the thrown property with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When you hit with a ranged attack using this weapona445 it deals an extra 1d8 damage ora445 if the target is a gianta445 2d8 damage. Immediately after the attacka445 the weapon flies back to your hand.a446Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown propertya445 you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapona445 you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For examplea445 if you throw a handaxea445 you use your Strengtha445 but if you throw a daggera445 you can use either your Strength or your Dexteritya445 since the dagger has the finesse property.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Frost Brand
Description: When you hit with an attack using this magic sworda445 the target takes an extra 1d6 cold damage. In additiona445 while you hold the sworda445 you have resistance to fire damage.a446In freezing temperaturesa445 the blade sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.a446When you draw this weapona445 you can extinguish all nonmagical flames within 30 feet of you. This property can be used no more than once per hour.

Name: Nine Lives Stealer (Fully Charged)
Description: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.a446The sword has 1d8 + 1 charges. If you score a critical hit against a creature that has fewer than 100 hit pointsa445 it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be slain instantly as the sword tears its life force from its body (a construct or an undead is immune). The sword loses 1 charge if the creature is slain. When the sword has no charges remaininga445 it loses this property.

Name: Oathbow
Description: When you nock an arrow on this bowa445 it whispers in Elvisha445 Swift defeat to my enemies. When you use this weapon to make a ranged attacka445 you cana445 as a command phrasea445 saya445 Swift death to you who have wronged me. The target of your attack becomes your sworn enemy until it dies or until dawn seven days later. You can have only one such sworn enemy at a time. When your sworn enemy diesa445 you can choose a new one after the next dawn.a446When you make a ranged attack roll with this weapon against your sworn enemya445 you have advantage on the roll. In additiona445 your target gains no benefit from covera445 other than total covera445 and you suffer no disadvantage due to long range. If the attack hitsa445 your sworn enemy takes an extra 3d6 piercing damage.a446While your sworn enemy livesa445 you have disadvantage on attack rolls with all other weapons.a446Range. A weapon that can be used to make a ranged attack has a range shown in parentheses after the ammunition or thrown property. The range lists two numbers. The first is the weapon's normal range in feeta445 and the second indicates the weapon's maximum range. When attacking a target beyond normal rangea445 you have disadvantage on the attack roll. You can't attack a target beyond the weapon's long range.a446Ammunition. You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapona445 you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quivera445 casea445 or other container is part of the attack. Loading a one-handed weapon requires a free hand. At the end of the battlea445 you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.a446If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attacka445 you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon. A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.a446Heavy. Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons. A heavy weapon's size and bulk make it too large for a Small creature to use effectively.a446Two-Handed. This weapon requires two hands to use. This property is relevant only when you attack with the weapona445 not when you simply hold it.

Name: Scimitar of Speed
Description: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. In additiona445 you can make one attack with it as a bonus action on each of your turns.a446Finesse. When making an attack with a finesse weapona445 you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.a446Light. A light weapon is small and easy to handlea445 making it ideal for use when fighting with two weapons.

Name: Spear of Backbiting
Description: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you throw ita445 its normal and long ranges both increase by 30 feet. and it deals one extra die of damage on a hit. After you throw it and it hits or missesa445 it flies back to your hand immediately.a446Curse. This weapon is curseda445 and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with remove curse or similar magica445 you are unwilling to part with the weapona445 keeping it within reach at all times. In additiona445 you have disadvantage on attack rolls made with weapons other than this one.a446Whenever you roll a 1 on an attack roll using this weapona445 the weapon bends or flies to hit you in the back. Make a new attack roll with advantage against your own AC. If the result is a hita445 you take damage as if you had attacked yourself with the spear.a446Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown propertya445 you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapona445 you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For examplea445 if you throw a handaxea445 you use your Strengtha445 but if you throw a daggera445 you can use either your Strength or your Dexteritya445 since the dagger has the finesse property.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Sword of the Paruns
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Additionallya445 once on each of your turnsa445 you can use one of the following properties if you're holding the sword:a446Immediately after you use the Attack action to attack with the sworda445 you can enable one creature within 60 feet of you to use its reaction to make one weapon attack.a446Immediately after you take the Dash actiona445 you can enable one creature within 60 feet of you to use its reaction to move up to its speed.a446Immediately after you take the Dodge actiona445 you can enable one creature within 60 feet of you to use its reaction to gain the benefits of the Dodge action.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Azuredge
Description: Forged by the archwizard Ahghairona445 this intelligent battleaxe was crafted to defend Waterdeep. Its current wielder is a former member of Force Grey named Meloon Wardragona445 but the weapon is searching for a new owner.a446Azuredge has a solid steel handle etched with tiny runesa445 wrapped in blue dragon hide with a star sapphire set into the pommel. The axe head is forged from silvera445 electruma445 and steel alloys whose edges constantly shimmer with a deep blue luminescence.a446You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. The shield spell provides no defense against the axea445 which passes through that spell's barrier of magical force.a446When you hit a fiend or an undead with the axea445 cold blue flames erupt from its blade and deal an extra 2d6 radiant damage to the target.a446Hurling. The battleaxe has 3 charges. You can expend 1 charge and make a ranged attack with the axea445 hurling it as if it had the thrown property with a normal range of 60 feet and a long range of 180 feet. Whether it hits or missesa445 the axe flies back to you at the end of the current turna445 landing in your open hand or at your feet in your space (as you choose). The axe regains all expended charges daily at dawn.a446Illumination. While holding the axea445 you can use an action to cause the axe to glow blue or to quench the glow. This glow sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.a446Sentience. Azuredge is a sentient lawful neutral weapon with an Intelligence of 12a445 a Wisdom of 15a445 and a Charisma of 15. It has hearing and darkvision out to a range of 120 feet.a446The weapon communicates telepathically with its wielder and can speaka445 reada445 and understand Common. It has a calma445 delicate voice. The weapon can sense the presence of non-lawful creatures within 120 feet of it.a446Personality. Azuredge is sworn to protect Waterdeepa445 and it desires to be wielded by a law-abiding person willing to dedicate everything to the city's defense. The weapon is patient and takes its time finding its ideal wielder.a446If someone tries to use Azuredge against its willa445 the axe can become ten times heavier than normala445 and can magically adhere to any Medium or larger object or surface it comes into contact with. Once it does soa445 the axe can't be wielded. Nothing short of a wish spell can separate the axe from the item or surface to which it is adhered without destroying one or the othera445 though the axe can choose to end the effect at any time.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Bookmark
Description: This +3 dagger belongs to Artus Cimber. While you have the dagger drawna445 you can use a bonus action to activate one of the following properties:a446Cause a blue gem set into the dagger's pommel to shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feeta445 or make the gem go dark.a446Turn the dagger into a compass thata445 while resting on your palma445 points north.a446Cast dimension door from the dagger. Once this property is useda445 it can't be used again until the next dawn.a446Cast compulsion (save DC 15) from the dagger. The range of the spell increases to 90 feet but it targets only spiders that are beasts. Once this property is useda445 it can't be used again until the next dawn.a446Finesse. When making an attack with a finesse weapona445 you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.a446Light. A light weapon is small and easy to handlea445 making it ideal for use when fighting with two weapons.a446Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown propertya445 you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapona445 you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For examplea445 if you throw a handaxea445 you use your Strengtha445 but if you throw a daggera445 you can use either your Strength or your Dexteritya445 since the dagger has the finesse property.

Name: Dawnbringer
Description: Lost for ages in the Underdarka445 Dawnbringer appears to be a gilded longsword hilt. While grasping the hilta445 you can use a bonus action to make a blade of pure radiance spring from the hilta445 or cause the blade to disappear. While the blade existsa445 this magic longsword has the finesse property. If you are proficient with shortswords or longswordsa445 you are proficient with Dawnbringer.a446You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapona445 which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage. When you hit an undead with ita445 that target takes an extra 1d8 radiant damage.a446The sword's luminous blade emits bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The light is sunlight. While the blade persistsa445 you can use an action to expand or reduce its radius of bright and dim light by 5 feet eacha445 to a maximum of 30 feet each or a minimum of 10 feet each.a446While holding the weapona445 you can use an action to touch a creature with the blade and cast lesser restoration on that creature. Once useda445 this ability can't be used again until the next dawn.a446Sentience. Dawnbringer is a sentient neutral good weapon with an Intelligence of 12a445 a Wisdom of 15a445 and a Charisma of 14. It has hearing and darkvision out to a range of 120 feet.a446The sword can speaka445 reada445 and understand Commona445 and it can communicate with its wielder telepathically. Its voice is kind and feminine. It knows every language you know while attuned to it.a446Personality. Forged by ancient sun worshippersa445 Dawnbringer is meant to bring light into darkness and to fight creatures of darkness. It is kind and compassionate to those in needa445 but fierce and destructive to its enemies.a446Long years lost in darkness have made Dawnbringer frightened of both the dark and abandonment. It prefers that its blade always be present and shedding light in areas of darknessa445 and it strongly resists being parted from its wielder for any length of time.a446Finesse. When making an attack with a finesse weapona445 you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Defender
Description: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.a446The first time you attack with the sword on each of your turnsa445 you can transfer some or all of the sword's bonus to your Armor Classa445 instead of using the bonus on any attacks that turn. For examplea445 you could reduce the bonus to your attack and damage rolls to +1 and gain a +2 bonus to AC. The adjusted bonuses remain in effect until the start of your next turna445 although you must hold the sword to gain a bonus to AC from it.

Name: Drown
Description: A steel trident decorated with bronze barnacles along the upper part of its hafta445 Drown has a sea-green jewel just below the tines and a silver shell at the end of its haft. It floats on the surface if dropped onto watera445 and it floats in place if it is released underwater. The trident is always cool to the toucha445 and it is immune to any damage due to exposure to water. Drown contains a spark of Olhydraa445 the Princess of Evil Water.a446You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit with ita445 the targets take an extra 1d8 cold damage.a446Water Mastery. You gain the following benefits while you hold Drown:a446You can speak Aquan fluently.a446You have resistance to cold damage.a446You can cast dominate monster (save DC 17) on a water elemental. Once you have done soa445 Drown can't be used this way again until the next dawn.a446Tears of Endless Anguish. While inside a water nodea445 you can perform a ritual called the Tears of Endless Anguisha445 using Drown to create a devastation orb of water. Once you perform the rituala445 Drown can't be used to perform the ritual again until the next dawn.a446Flaw. Drown makes its wielder covetous. While attuned to the weapona445 you gain the following flaw: I demand and deserve the largest share of the spoilsa445 and I refuse to part with anything that's mine. In additiona445 if you are attuned to Drown for 24 consecutive hoursa445 barnacles form on your skin. The barnacles can be removed with a greater restoration spell or similar magica445 but not while you are attuned to the weapon.a446Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown propertya445 you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapona445 you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For examplea445 if you throw a handaxea445 you use your Strengtha445 but if you throw a daggera445 you can use either your Strength or your Dexteritya445 since the dagger has the finesse property.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Gurt’s Greataxe
Description: n the Year of the Icy Axe (123 DR)a445 the frost giant Lord Gurt fell to Uthgar Gardolfsson—leader of the folk who would become the Uthgardt barbarians—in a battle that marked the ascendance of humankind over the giants in the Dessarin Valley. Gurt's greataxe was buried in Morgur's Mound until it was unearthed and brought back to Waterdeep. After laying in the city's vaults for decadesa445 the axe was given to Harshnaga445 a frost giant adventurera445 in recognition of his service to Waterdeep. Uthgardt barbarians recognize the weapon on sight and attack any giant that wields it.a446You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. It is sized for a gianta445 weighs 325 poundsa445 and deals 3d12 slashing damage on a hita445 plus an extra 2d12 slashing damage if the target is human.a446The axe sheds light as a torch when the temperature around it drops below 0 degrees Fahrenheit. The light can't be shut off in these conditions.a446As an actiona445 you can cast a version of the heat metal spell (save DC 13) that deals cold damage instead of fire damage. Once this power is useda445 it can't be used again until the next dawn.a446Heavy. Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons. A heavy weapon's size and bulk make it too large for a Small creature to use effectively.a446Two-Handed. This weapon requires two hands to use. This property is relevant only when you attack with the weapona445 not when you simply hold it.

Name: Hammer of Thunderbolts
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.a446Giant's Bane (Requires Attunement). You must be wearing a belt of giant strength (any variety) and gauntlets of ogre power to attune to this weapon. The attunement ends if you take off either of those items. While you are attuned to this weapon and holding ita445 your Strength score increases by 4 and can exceed 20a445 but not 30. When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon against a gianta445 the giant must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or die.a446The hammer also has 5 charges. While attuned to ita445 you can expend 1 charge and make a ranged weapon attack with the hammera445 hurling it as if it had the thrown property with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. If the attack hitsa445 the hammer unleashes a thunderclap audible out to 300 feet. The target and every creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of your next turn. The hammer regains 1d4 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn.a446Heavy. Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons. A heavy weapon's size and bulk make it too large for a Small creature to use effectively.a446Two-Handed. This weapon requires two hands to use. This property is relevant only when you attack with the weapona445 not when you simply hold it.

Name: Hazirawn
Description: A sentient (neutral evil) greatsworda445 Hazirawn is capable of speech in Common and Netherese. Even if you aren't attuned to the sworda445 you gain a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. If you are not attuned to Hazirawna445 you deal an extra 1d6 necrotic damage when you hit with the weapon.a446Increased Potency. While you are attuned to this weapona445 its bonus on attack and damage rolls increases to +2a445 and a hit deals an extra 2d6 necrotic damage (instead of 1d6).a446Spells. Hazirawn has 4 charges to cast spells. As long as the sword is attuned to you and you are holding it in your handa445 you can cast detect magic (1 charge)a445 detect evil and good (1 charge)a445 or detect thoughts (2 charges). Each night at midnighta445 Hazirawn regains 1d4 expended charges.a446Wounding. While you are attuned to the weapona445 any creature that you hit with Hazirawn can't regain hit points for 1 minute. The target can make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turnsa445 ending this effect early on a success.a446Heavy. Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons. A heavy weapon's size and bulk make it too large for a Small creature to use effectively.a446Two-Handed. This weapon requires two hands to use. This property is relevant only when you attack with the weapona445 not when you simply hold it.

Name: Holy Avenger
Description: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit a fiend or an undead with ita445 that creature takes an extra 2d10 radiant damage.a446While you hold the drawn sworda445 it creates an aura in a 10-foot radius around you. You and all creatures friendly to you in the aura have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. If you have 17 or more levels in the paladin classa445 the radius of the aura increases to 30 feet.

Name: Ironfang
Description: A war pick forged from a single piece of irona445 Ironfang has a fang-like head inscribed with ancient runes. The pick is heavy in the handa445 but when the wielder swings the pick in angera445 the weapon seems almost weightless. This weapon is immune to any form of rusta445 acida445 or corrosion—nothing seems to mark it. Ironfang contains a spark of Ogrémocha445 the Prince of Evil Earth.a446You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit with ita445 the target takes an extra 1d8 thunder damage.a446Earth Mastery. You gain the following benefits while you hold Ironfang:a446You can speak Terran fluently.a446You have resistance to acid damage.a446You have tremorsense out to a range of 60 feet.a446You can sense the presence of precious metals and stones within 60 feet of youa445 but not their exact location.a446You can cast dominate monster (save DC 17) on an earth elemental. Once you have done soa445 Ironfang can't be used this way again until the next dawn.a446Shatter. Ironfang has 3 charges. You can use your action to expend 1 charge and cast the 2nd-level version of shatter (DC 17). Ironfang regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.a446The Rumbling. While inside an earth nodea445 you can perform a ritual called the Rumblinga445 using Ironfang to create a devastation orb of earth. Once you perform the rituala445 Ironfang can't be used to perform the ritual again until the next dawn.a446Flaw. Ironfang heightens its wielder's destructive nature. While attuned to the weapona445 you gain the following flaw: I like to break things and cause ruin.

Name: Korolnor Scepter
Description: The Korolnor Scepter is one of ten Ruling Scepters of Shanatara445 forged by the dwarven gods and given to the ruling houses of the ancient dwarven empire. The Korolnor Scepter's location was unknown for the longest time until a storm giant queena445 Neria445 found it in a barnacle-covered shipwreck at the bottom of the Trackless Sea. The Ruling Scepters are all roughly the same size and shapea445 but their materials and properties vary.a446The Korolnor Scepter is a tapered mithral rod as thick and long as a dwarf's forearma445 with a small platinum knob at the bottom and a rounded disk adorned with a ring of seven tiny blue gems at the top.a446You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this sceptera445 which can be wielded as a magic club.a446You can use the properties of the Wyrmskull Thronea445 as well as the properties of the scepter itself. The scepter has 10 chargesa445 and it regains 1d6 + 4 expanded charges at dawn. Its properties are as follows:a446If you are underground or underwatera445 you can use an action to expend 1 charge to determine the distance to the surface.a446As an action: you can expend 2 charges to cast the sending spell from the scepter.a446As an action: you can expend 3 charges to cast the teleport spell from the scepter. If the destination is within 60 feet of the Wyrmskull Thronea445 there is no chance of a teleport error or mishap occurring.a446Light. A light weapon is small and easy to handlea445 making it ideal for use when fighting with two weapons.

Name: Luck Blade
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. While the sword is on your persona445 you also gain a +1 bonus to saving throws.a446Luck. If the sword is on your persona445 you can call on its luck (no action required) to reroll one attack rolla445 ability checka445 or saving throw you dislike. You must use the second roll. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.a446Wish. The sword has 1d4 - 1 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 charge and cast the wish spell from it. This property can't be used again until the next dawn. The sword loses this property if it has no charges.

Name: Orcsplitter
Description: A mighty axe wielded long ago by the dwarf king Torhild Flametonguea445 Orcsplitter is a battered weapon that appears unremarkable at first glance. Its head is graven with the Dwarvish runes for orca445 but the runes are depicted with a gap or slash through the markings; the word orc is literally split in two.a446You gain the following benefits while holding this magic weapon:a446You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it.a446When you roll a 20 on an attack roll with this weapon against an orca445 that orc must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or drop to 0 hit points.a446You can't be surprised by orcs while you're not incapacitated. You are also aware when orcs are within 120 feet of you and aren't behind total covera445 although you don't know their location.a446You and any of your friends within 30 feet of you can't be frightened while you're not incapacitated.a446Sentience. Orcsplitter is a sentienta445 lawful good weapon with an Intelligence of 6a445 a Wisdom of 15a445 and a Charisma of 10. It can see and hear out to 120 feet and has darkvision. It communicates by transmitting emotions to its wieldera445 although on rare occasions it uses a limited form of telepathy to bring to the wielder's mind a couplet or stanza of ancient Dwarvish verse.a446Personality. Orcsplitter is grima445 taciturna445 and inflexible. It knows little more than the desire to face orcs in battle and serve a courageousa445 just wielder. It disdains cowards and any form of duplicitya445 deceptiona445 or disloyalty. The weapon's purpose is to defend dwarves and to serve as a symbol of dwarven resolve. It hates the traditional foes of dwarves—giantsa445 goblinsa445 anda445 most of alla445 orcs—and silently urges its possessor to meet such creatures in battle.a446Heavy. Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons. A heavy weapon's size and bulk make it too large for a Small creature to use effectively.a446Two-Handed. This weapon requires two hands to use. This property is relevant only when you attack with the weapona445 not when you simply hold it.

Name: Rakdos Riteknife
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Its blade is cruelly serrateda445 and its hilt resembles a demonic head and wings. Whenever you slay a creature with an attack using the daggera445 the creature's soul is imprisoned inside the daggera445 and that creature can be restored to life only by a wish spell. The dagger can hold a maximum of five souls.a446For each soul imprisoned in the daggera445 your attacks with it deal an extra 1d4 necrotic damage on a hit. While the dagger is within 5 feet of youa445 your dreams are haunted by whispers from the trapped souls.a446The dagger has the following additional properties.a446Siphon Vitality. As a bonus actiona445 you can release any number of stored souls from the dagger to regain 1d10 hit points per soul released.a446Annihilation. If the dagger holds five soulsa445 you can use this property: As a reaction immediately after you hit a creature with the dagger and deal damage to that targeta445 you can release all five souls. If the target now has fewer than 75 hit pointsa445 it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or die. If the target diesa445 you can't use this property again until you finish a long rest.a446Finesse. When making an attack with a finesse weapona445 you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.a446Light. A light weapon is small and easy to handlea445 making it ideal for use when fighting with two weapons.a446Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown propertya445 you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapona445 you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For examplea445 if you throw a handaxea445 you use your Strengtha445 but if you throw a daggera445 you can use either your Strength or your Dexteritya445 since the dagger has the finesse property.

Name: Sunsword
Description: The Sunsword is a unique blade once possessed by Strahd's brothera445 Sergei von Zarovich. In its original forma445 it had a platinum hilt and guarda445 and a thin crystal blade as strong as steel.a446Strahd employed a powerful wizard named Khazan to destroy the weapon after Sergei's death. The first part of the process required the hilt and the blade to be separateda445 which Khazan accomplished. While Khazan was busying himself destroying the bladea445 his apprentice stole the hilt and fled. Khazan later located his apprentice's mutilated corpse in the Svalich Woodsa445 but the hilt was nowhere to be found. To avoid the vampire's wratha445 Khazan told Strahd that the entire weapon had been destroyed.a446The hilta445 which is sentienta445 knows that it can never be reunited with its original crystal blade. It hasa445 howevera445 gained the properties of a sun blade.a446Sentience. The Sunsword is a sentient chaotic good weapon with an Intelligence of 11a445 a Wisdom of 17a445 and a Charisma of 16. It has hearing and normal vision out to a range of 60 feet. The weapon communicates by transmitting emotions to the creature carrying it or wielding it.a446Personality. The Sunsword's special purpose is to destroy Strahda445 not so much because it wants to free the land of Barovia from evil but because it wants revenge for the loss of its crystal blade. The weapon secretly fears its own destruction.a446Sun blade. This item appears to be a longsword hilt. While grasping the hilta445 you can use a bonus action to cause a blade of pure radiance to spring into existencea445 or make the blade disappear. While the blade existsa445 this magic longsword has the finesse property. If you are proficient with shortswords or longswordsa445 you are proficient with the sun blade.a446You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapona445 which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage. When you hit an undead with ita445 that target takes an extra 1d8 radiant damage.a446The sword's luminous blade emits bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The light is sunlight. While the blade persistsa445 you can use an action to expand or reduce its radius of bright and dim light by 5 feet eacha445 to a maximum of 30 feet each or a minimum of 10 feet each.a446Finesse. When making an attack with a finesse weapona445 you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Sword of Answering
Description: Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.a446Multiple variations of this item exista445 as listed below:a446Sword of Answering (Answerer)a446Sword of Answering (Back Talker)a446Sword of Answering (Concluder)a446Sword of Answering (Last Quip)a446Sword of Answering (Rebutter)a446Sword of Answering (Replier)a446Sword of Answering (Retorter)a446Sword of Answering (Scather)a446Sword of Answering (Squelcher)

Name: Tinderstrike
Description: A flint daggera445 Tinderstrike is uncommonly sharpa445 and sparks cascade off its edge whenever it strikes something solid. Its handle is always warm to the toucha445 and the blade smolders for 1d4 minutes after it is used to deal damage. It contains a spark of Imixa445 Prince of Evil Fire.a446You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit with ita445 the target takes an extra 2d6 fire damage.a446Fire Mastery. You gain the following benefits while you hold Tinderstrike:a446You can speak Ignan fluently.a446You have resistance to fire damage.a446You can cast dominate monster (save DC 17) on a fire elemental. Once you have done soa445 Tinderstrike can't be used this way again until the next dawn.a446Dance of the All-Consuming Fire. While inside a fire nodea445 you can perform a ritual called the Dance of the All-Consuming Firea445 using Tinderstrike to create a devastation orb of fire. Once you perform the rituala445 Tinderstrike can't be used to perform the ritual again until the next dawn.a446Flaw. Tinderstrike makes its wielder impatient and rash. While attuned to the weapona445 you gain the following flaw: I act without thinking and take risks without weighing the consequences.a446Finesse. When making an attack with a finesse weapona445 you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.a446Light. A light weapon is small and easy to handlea445 making it ideal for use when fighting with two weapons.a446Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown propertya445 you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapona445 you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For examplea445 if you throw a handaxea445 you use your Strengtha445 but if you throw a daggera445 you can use either your Strength or your Dexteritya445 since the dagger has the finesse property.

Name: Vorpal Sword
Description: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. In additiona445 the weapon ignores resistance to slashing damage.a446When you attack a creature that has at least one head with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack rolla445 you cut off one of the creature's heads. The creature dies if it can't survive without the lost head. A creature is immune to this effect if it is immune to slashing damagea445 doesn't have or need a heada445 has legendary actionsa445 or the DM decides that the creature is too big for its head to be cut off with this weapon. Such a creature instead takes an extra 6d8 slashing damage from the hit.

Name: Waythe
Description: Waythe is a unique greatsword most recently in the possession of a high-ranking cloud giant ambassador.a446You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit a creature of the giant type with ita445 the giant takes an extra 2d6 slashing damagea445 and it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or fall prone.a446The sword also functions as a wand of enemy detection. It regains all of its expended charges at dawn and isn't at risk of crumbling if its last charge is used.a446Sentience. Waythe is a sentient weapon of neutral good alignmenta445 with an Intelligence of 12a445 a Wisdom of 2a445 and a Charisma of 14. It has hearing and darkvision out to a range of 120 feet.a446The weapon can speak and understand Giant and Commona445 and it can communicate telepathically with its wielder.a446Personality. This sword believes in freedom and allowing others to live as they see fit. It is protective of its friendsa445 and wants to be friends with a like-minded wielder. (It takes only 1 minute for a good-aligned character to gain attunement with the sword.) Waythe is courageous to the point of foolhardinessa445 howevera445 and vocally urges bold action. It is likely to come into conflict with an evil or a timid wielder.a446Heavy. Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons. A heavy weapon's size and bulk make it too large for a Small creature to use effectively.a446Two-Handed. This weapon requires two hands to use. This property is relevant only when you attack with the weapona445 not when you simply hold it.

Name: Windvane
Description: A silver speara445 Windvane has dark sapphires on the filigreed surface of its polished head. Held by its shining hafta445 the weapon feels insubstantiala445 as if clutching a coola445 gently flowing breeze. The spear contains a spark of Yan-C-Bina445 the Prince of Evil Air.a446You have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapona445 which has the finesse weapon property. When you hit with ita445 the target takes an extra 1d6 lightning damage.a446Air Mastery. You gain the following benefits while you hold Windvane:a446You can speak Auran fluently.a446You have resistance to lightning damage.a446You can cast dominate monster (save DC 17) on an air elemental. Once you have done soa445 Windvane can't be used this way again until the next dawn.a446Song of the Four Winds. While inside an air nodea445 you can perform a ritual called the Song of the Four Windsa445 using Windvane to create a devastation orb of air. Once you perform the rituala445 Windvane can't be used to perform the ritual again until the next dawn.a446Flaw. Windvane makes its wielder mercurial and unreliable. While attuned to the weapona445 you gain the following flaw: I break my vows and plans. Duty and honor mean nothing to me.a446Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown propertya445 you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapona445 you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For examplea445 if you throw a handaxea445 you use your Strengtha445 but if you throw a daggera445 you can use either your Strength or your Dexteritya445 since the dagger has the finesse property.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.a446Finesse. When making an attack with a finesse weapona445 you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.

Name: Shield of Expression
Description: The front of this shield is shaped in the likeness of a face. While bearing the shielda445 you can use a bonus action to alter the faces expression.

Name: Sentinel Shield
Description: While holding this shielda445 you have advantage on initiative rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks. The shield is emblazoned with a symbol of an eye.

Name: Arrow-Catching Shield
