Description: You gain a +2 bonus to AC against ranged attacks while you wield this shield. This bonus is in addition to the shield’s normal bonus to AC. In addition  whenever an attacker makes a ranged attack against a target within 5 feet of you  you can use your reaction to become the target of the attack instead.

Name: Pariah’s Shield
Description: Soldiers of the Boros Legion consider it an honor to bear this shielda445 even knowing that it might be the last honor they receive. The front of the shield is sculpted to depict a grieving human face.a446You gain a +1 bonus to AC for every two allies within 5 feet of you (up to a maximum of +3) while you wield this shield. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC.a446When a creature you can see within 5 feet of you takes damagea445 you can use your reaction to take that damagea445 instead of the creature taking it. When you do soa445 the damage type changes to force.

Name: Shield of Missile Attraction
Description: While holding this shielda445 you have resistance to damage from ranged weapon attacks.a446Curse. This shield is cursed. Attuning to it curses you until you are targeted by the remove curse spell or similar magic. Removing the shield fails to end the curse on you. Whenever a ranged weapon attack is made against a target within 10 feet of youa445 the curse causes you to become the target instead.

Name: Animated Shield
Description: While holding this shield  you can speak its command word as a bonus action to cause it to animate. The shield leaps into the air and hovers in your space to protect you as if you were wielding it  leaving your hands free. The shield remains animated for 1 minute  until you use a bonus action to end this effect  or until you are incapacitated or die  at which point the shield falls to the ground or into your hand if you have one free.

Name: Spellguard Shield
Description: While holding this shielda445 you have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effectsa445 and spell attacks have disadvantage against you.

Name: Armor of Vulnerability
Description: While wearing this armor  you have resistance to one of the following damage types: bludgeoning  piercing  or slashing. The GM chooses the type or determines it randomly. Curse. This armor is cursed  a fact that is revealed only when an identify spell is cast on the armor or you attune to it. Attuning to the armor curses you until you are targeted by the remove curse spell or similar magic; removing the armor fails to end the curse. While cursed  you have vulnerability to two of the three damage types associated with the armor (not the one to which it grants resistance).

Name: Elven Chain
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC while you wear this armor. You are considered proficient with this armor even if you lack proficiency with medium armor.

Name: Glamoured Studded Leather
Description: While wearing this armora445 you gain a +1 bonus to AC. You can also use a bonus action to speak the armor's command word and cause the armor to assume the appearance of a normal set of clothing or some other kind of armor. You decide what it looks likea445 including colora445 stylea445 and accessoriesa445 but the armor retains its normal bulk and weight. The illusory appearance lasts until you use this property again or remove the armor.

Name: Scorpion Armor
Description: This suit of plate armor is fashioned from giant scorpion chitin. While wearing this armora445 you gain the following benefits:a446The armor improves your combat readinessa445 granting you a +5 bonus to initiative as long as you aren't incapacitated.a446The armor doesn't impose disadvantage on your Dexterity (Stealth) checks.a446The armor doesn't impose disadvantage on saving throws made to resist the effects of extreme heat (see chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide).a446Curse. This armor is cursed. Whenever you don or doff ita445 you must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throwa445 taking 100 (10d10 + 45) poison damage on a failed savea445 or half as much damage on a successful one. Only a wish spell can remove the armor's curse.a446If the wearer has a Strength score lower than 15a445 their speed is reduced by 10 feet.

Name: Demon Armor
Description: While wearing this armora445 you gain a +1 bonus to ACa445 and you can understand and speak Abyssal. In additiona445 the armor's clawed gauntlets turn unarmed strikes with your hands into magic weapons that deal slashing damagea445 with a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls and a damage die of 1d8.a446Curse. Once you don this cursed armora445 you can't doff it unless you are targeted by the remove curse spell or similar magic. While wearing the armora445 you have disadvantage on attack rolls against demons and on saving throws against their spells and special abilities.a446The wearer has disadvantage on Stealth (Dexterity) checks.a446If the wearer has a Strength score lower than 15a445 their speed is reduced by 10 feet.

Name: Dragon Scale Mail
Description: The wearer has disadvantage on Stealth (Dexterity) checks.a446Multiple variations of this item exista445 as listed below:a446Black Dragon Scale Maila446Blue Dragon Scale Maila446Brass Dragon Scale Maila446Bronze Dragon Scale Maila446Copper Dragon Scale Maila446Gold Dragon Scale Maila446Green Dragon Scale Maila446Red Dragon Scale Maila446Silver Dragon Scale Maila446White Dragon Scale Mail

Name: Dwarven Plate
Description: While wearing this armora445 you gain a +2 bonus to AC. In additiona445 if an effect moves you against your will along the grounda445 you can use your reaction to reduce the distance you are moved by up to 10 feet.a446The wearer has disadvantage on Stealth (Dexterity) checks.a446If the wearer has a Strength score lower than 15a445 their speed is reduced by 10 feet.

Name: Armor of Invulnerability
Description: You have resistance to nonmagical damage while you wear this armor. Additionally  you can use an action to make yourself immune to nonmagical damage for 10 minutes or until you are no longer wearing the armor. Once this special action is used  it can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Name: Efreeti Chain
Description: While wearing this armora445 you gain a +3 bonus to ACa445 you are immune to fire damagea445 and you can understand and speak Primordial. In additiona445 you can stand on and walk across molten rock as if it were solid ground.a446The wearer has disadvantage on Stealth (Dexterity) checks.a446If the wearer has a Strength score lower than 13a445 their speed is reduced by 10 feet.

Name: Plate Armour of Etherealness
Description: While you're wearing this armora445 you can speak its command word as an action to gain the effect of the etherealness spella445 which lasts for 10 minutes or until you remove the armor or use an action to speak the command word again. This property of the armor can't be used again until the next dawn.a446The wearer has disadvantage on Stealth (Dexterity) checks.a446If the wearer has a Strength score lower than 15a445 their speed is reduced by 10 feet.

Name: Immovable Rod
Description: This flat iron rod has a button on one end. You can use an action to press the buttona445 which causes the rod to become magically fixed in place. Until you or another creature uses an action to push the button againa445 the rod doesn't movea445 even if it is defying gravity. The rod can hold up to 8a445000 pounds of weight. More weight causes the rod to deactivate and fall. A creature can use an action to make a DC 30 Strength checka445 moving the fixed rod up to 10 feet on a success

Name: Rod of the Pact Keeper +1
Description: While holding this roda445 you gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of your warlock spells.a446In additiona445 you can regain one warlock spell slot as an action while holding the rod. You can't use this property again until you finish a long rest.

Name: Rod of Rulership
Description: You can use an action to present the rod and command obedience from each creature of your choice that you can see within 120 feet of you. Each target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for 8 hours. While charmed in this waya445 the creature regards you as its trusted leader. If harmed by you or your companionsa445 or commanded to do something contrary to its naturea445 a target ceases to be charmed in this way. The rod can't be used again until the next dawn.

Name: Rod of the Pact Keeper +2
Description: While holding this roda445 you gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of your warlock spells.a446In additiona445 you can regain one warlock spell slot as an action while holding the rod. You can't use this property again until you finish a long rest.

Name: Rod of the Vonindod
Description: The fire giant Duke Zalto hired a wizard to craft several of these adamantine rods. Each measures 4 feet longa445 weighs 100 poundsa445 and is sized to fit comfortably in a fire giant's hand. The rod has two prongs at one end and a molded handle grip on the opposite end.a446The rod has 10 charges and regains 1d6 + 4 of its expended charges daily at dawn. As an actiona445 you can grasp it by the handle and expend 1 charge to cast the locate object spell from it. When the rod is used to detect objects made of adamantinea445 such as fragments of the Vonindod constructa445 its range increases to 10 miles.

Name: Tentacle Rod
Description: Made by the drowa445 this rod is a magic weapon that ends in three rubbery tentacles. While holding the roda445 you can use an action to direct each tentacle to attack a creature you can see within 15 feet of you. Each tentacle makes a melee attack roll with a +9 bonus. On a hita445 the tentacle deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage. If you hit a target with all three tentaclesa445 it must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failurea445 the creature's speed is halveda445 it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throwsa445 and it can't use reactions for 1 minute. Moreovera445 on each of its turnsa445 it can take either an action or a bonus actiona445 but not both. At the end of each of its turnsa445 it can repeat the saving throwa445 ending the effect on itself on a success.

Name: Rod of Absorbtion
Description: While holding this roda445 you can use your reaction to absorb a spell that is targeting only you and not with an area of effect. The absorbed spell's effect is canceleda445 and the spell's energy—not the spell itself—is stored in the rod. The energy has the same level as the spell when it was cast. The rod can absorb and store up to 50 levels of energy over the course of its existence. Once the rod absorbs 50 levels of energya445 it can't absorb more. If you are targeted by a spell that the rod can't storea445 the rod has no effect on that spell.a446When you become attuned to the roda445 you know how many levels of energy the rod has absorbed over the course of its existencea445 and how many levels of spell energy it currently has stored.a446If you are a spellcaster holding the roda445 you can convert energy stored in it into spell slots to cast spells you have prepared or know. You can create spell slots only of a level equal to or lower than your own spell slotsa445 up to a maximum of 5th level. You use the stored levels in place of your slotsa445 but otherwise cast the spell as normal. For examplea445 you can use 3 levels stored in the rod as a 3rd-level spell slot.a446A newly found rod has 1d10 levels of spell energy stored in it already. A rod that can no longer absorb spell energy and has no energy remaining becomes nonmagical.

Name: Rod of Alertness
Spells Needed: Detect Good and Evil Detect Magic Detect Poison and Disease See Invisibility
Description: This rod has a flanged head and the following properties.a446Alertness. While holding the roda445 you have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on rolls for initiative.a446Spells. While holding the roda445 you can use an action to cast one of the following spells from it: detect evil and gooda445 detect magica445 detect poison and diseasea445 or see invisibility.a446Protective Aura. As an actiona445 you can plant the haft end of the rod in the grounda445 whereupon the rod's head sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius and dim light for an additional 60 feet. While in that bright lighta445 you and any creature that is friendly to you gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws and can sense the location of any invisible hostile creature that is also in the bright light.a446The rod's head stops glowing and the effect ends after 10 minutesa445 or when a creature uses an action to pull the rod from the ground. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

Name: Rod of Security
Description: While holding this roda445 you can use an action to activate it. The rod then instantly transports you and up to 199 other willing creatures you can see to a paradise that exists in an extraplanar space. You choose the form that the paradise takes. It could be a tranquil gardena445 lovely gladea445 cheery taverna445 immense palacea445 tropical islanda445 fantastic carnivala445 or whatever else you can imagine. Regardless of its naturea445 the paradise contains enough water and food to sustain its visitors. Everything else that can be interacted with inside the extraplanar space can exist only there. For examplea445 a flower picked from a garden in the paradise disappears if it is taken outside the extraplanar space.a446For each hour spent in the paradisea445 a visitor regains hit points as if it had spent 1 Hit Die. Alsoa445 creatures don't age while in the paradisea445 although time passes normally. Visitors can remain in the paradise for up to 200 days divided by the number of creatures present (round down).a446When the time runs out or you use an action to end ita445 all visitors reappear in the location they occupied when you activated the roda445 or an unoccupied space nearest that location. The rod can't be used again until ten days have passed.

Name: Rod of the Pact Keeper +3
Description: While holding this roda445 you gain a +3 bonus to spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of your warlock spells.a446In additiona445 you can regain one warlock spell slot as an action while holding the rod. You can't use this property again until you finish a long rest.

Name: Rod of Lordly Might
Description: This rod has a flanged heada445 and it functions as a magic mace that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage roll made with it. The rod has properties associated with six different buttons that are set in a row along the haft. It has three other properties as wella445 detailed below.a446Six Buttons. You can press one of the rod's six buttons as a bonus action. A button's effect lasts until you push a different button or until you push the same button againa445 which causes the rod to revert to its normal form.a446If you press button 1a445 the rod becomes a flame tongue as a fiery blade sprouts from the end opposite the rod's flanged head (you choose the type of sword).a446If you press button 2a445 the rod's flanged head folds down and two crescent-shaped blades spring outa445 transforming the rod into a magic battleaxe that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it.a446If you press button 3a445 the rod's flanged head folds downa445 a spear point springs from the rod's tipa445 and the rod's handle lengthens into a 6-foot hafta445 transforming the rod into a magic spear that grants a+3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it.a446If you press button 4a445 the rod transforms into a climbing pole up to 50 feet longa445 as you specify. In surfaces as hard as granitea445 a spike at the bottom and three hooks at the top anchor the pole. Horizontal bars 3 inches long fold out from the sidesa445 1 foot aparta445 forming a ladder. The pole can bear up to 4a445000 pounds. More weight or lack of solid anchoring causes the rod to revert to its normal form.a446If you press button 5a445 the rod transforms into a handheld battering ram and grants its user a +10 bonus to Strength checks made to break through doorsa445 barricadesa445 and other barriers.a446If you press button 6a445 the rod assumes or remains in its normal form and indicates magnetic north. (Nothing happens if this function of the rod is used in a location that has no magnetic north.) The rod also gives you knowledge of your approximate depth beneath the ground or your height above it.a446Drain Life. When you hit a creature with a melee attack using the roda445 you can force the target to make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failurea445 the target rakes an extra 4d6 necrotic damagea445 and you regain a number of hit points equal to half that necrotic damage. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.a446Paralyze. When you hit a creature with a melee attack using the roda445 you can force the target to make a DC 17 Strength saving throw. On a failurea445 the target is paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turnsa445 ending the effect on a success. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.a446Terrify. While holding the roda445 you can use an action to force each creature you can see within 30 feet of you to make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failurea445 a target is frightened of you for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turnsa445 ending the effect on itself on a success. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.

Name: Rod of Resurrection
Description: The rod has 5 charges. While you hold ita445 you can use an action to cast one of the following spells from it: heal (expends 1 charge) or resurrection (expends 5 charges).a446The rod regains 1 expended charge daily at dawn. If the rod is reduced to 0 chargesa445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the rod disappears in a burst of radiance.

Name: Wand of Conducting
Description: This wand has 3 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges and create orchestral music by waving it around. The music can be heard out to a range of 60 feet and ends when you stop waving the wand.a446The wand regains all expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 a sad tuba sound plays as the wand crumbles to dust and is destroyed.

Name: Want of Pyrotechnics
Description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges and create a harmless burst of multicolored light at a point you can see up to 60 feet away. The burst of light is accompanied by a crackling noise that can be heard up to 300 feet away. The light is as bright as a torch flame but lasts only a second.a446The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand erupts in a harmless pyrotechnic display and is destroyed.

Name: Wand of Scowls/Smiles
Description: This wand has 3 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges and target a humanoid you can see within 30 feet of you. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Charisma saving throw or be forced to scowl for 1 minute.a446The wand regains all expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand transforms into a wand of smiles.a446This wand has 3 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges and target a humanoid you can see within 30 feet of you. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Charisma saving throw or be forced to smile for 1 minute.a446The wand regains all expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand transforms into a wand of scowls.

Name: Wand of Entangle
Description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cast the entangle spell (save DC 13) from it.a446The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

Name: Wand of Magic Detection
Description: This wand has 3 charges. While holding ita445 you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the detect magic spell from it. The wand regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.

Name: Wand of Magic Missiles
Description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the magic missile spell from it. For 1 chargea445 you cast the 1st-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.a446The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

Name: Wand of Secrets
Description: The wand has 3 charges. While holding it. you can use an action to expend 1 of its chargesa445 and if a secret door or trap is within 30 feet of youa445 the wand pulses and points at the one nearest to you. The wand regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.

Name: Wand of Web
Description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cast the web spell (save DC 15) from it.a446The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

Name: Wand of Binding
Description: This wand has 7 charges for the following properties. It regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.a446Spells. While holding the wanda445 you can use an action to expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells (save DC 17): hold monster (5 charges) or hold person (2 charges).a446Assisted Escape. While holding the wanda445 you can use your reaction to expend 1 charge and gain advantage on a saving throw you make to avoid being paralyzed or restraineda445 or you can expend 1 charge and gain advantage on any check you make to escape a grapple.

Name: Wand of Enemy Detection
Description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action and expend 1 charge to speak its command word. For the next minutea445 you know the direction of the nearest creature hostile to you within 60 feeta445 but not its distance from you. The wand can sense the presence of hostile creatures that are ethereala445 invisiblea445 disguiseda445 or hiddena445 as well as those in plain sight. The effect ends if you stop holding the wand.a446The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

Name: Wand of Fear
Description: This wand has 7 charges for the following properties. It regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.a446Command. While holding the wanda445 you can use an action to expend 1 charge and command another creature to flee or grovela445 as with the command spell (save DC 15).a446Cone of Fear. While holding the wanda445 you can use an action to expend 2 chargesa445 causing the wand's tip to emit a 60-foot cone of amber light. Each creature in the cone must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of you for 1 minute. While it is frightened in this waya445 a creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it cana445 and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you. It also can't take reactions. For its actiona445 it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevent it from moving. If it has nowhere it can movea445 the creature can use the Dodge action. At the end of each of its turnsa445 a creature can repeat the saving throwa445 ending the effect on itself on a success.

Name: Wand of Fireballs
Description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the fireball spell (save DC 15) from it. For 1 chargea445 you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.a446The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

Name: Wand of Lightning Bolts
Description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the lightning bolt spell (save DC 15) from it. For 1 chargea445 you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.a446The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

Name: Wand of Paralysis
Description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cause a thin blue ray to streak from the tip toward a creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turnsa445 it can repeat the saving throwa445 ending the effect on itself on a success.a446The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

Name: Wand of Viscid Globs
Description: Crafted by the drowa445 this slim black wand has 7 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cause a small glob of viscous material to launch from the tip at one creature within 60 feet of you. Make a ranged attack roll against the targeta445 with a bonus equal to your spellcasting modifier (or your Intelligence modifiera445 if you don't have a spellcasting modifier) plus your proficiency bonus. On a hita445 the glob expands and dries on the targeta445 which is restrained for 1 hour. After that timea445 the viscous material cracks and falls away.a446Applying a pint or more of alcohol to the restrained creature dissolves the glob instantlya445 as does the application of oil of etherealness or universal solvent. The glob also dissolves instantly if exposed to sunlight. No other nonmagical process can remove the viscous material until it deteriorates on its own.a446The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at midnight. If you expend the wands last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand melts into harmless slime and is destroyed.a446A wand of viscous globs is destroyed if exposed to sunlight for 1 hour without interruption.

Name: Wand of Winter
Spells Needed: Ray of Frosta445 Sleet Storm Ice Storm
Description: This wand looks and feels like an icicle. You must be attuned to the wand to use it.a446The wand has 7 chargesa445 which are used to fuel the spells within it. With the wand in handa445 you can use your action to cast one of the following spells from the wanda445 even if you are incapable of casting spells: ray of frost (no chargesa445 or 1 charge to cast at 5th level; +5 to hit with ranged spell attack)a445 sleet storm (3 charges; spell save DC 15)a445 or ice storm (4 charges; spell save DC 15). No components are required. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges each day at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 20a445 the wand melts awaya445 forever destroyed.

Name: Wand of Wonder
Spells Needed: Slow Faerie Fire Gust of Wind Detect Thoughts Stinking Cloud Lightning Bolt Enlarge/Reduce Darkness Fireball Invisibility
Description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges and choose a target within 120 feet of you. The target can be a creaturea445 an objecta445 or a point in space. Roll d100 and consult the following table to discover what happens.a446If the effect causes you to cast a spell from the wanda445 the spell's save DC is 15. If the spell normally has a range expressed in feeta445 its range becomes 120 feet if it isn't already.a446If an effect covers an areaa445 you must center the spell on and include the target. If an effect has multiple possible subjectsa445 the DM randomly determines which ones are affected.a446The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand crumbles into dust and is destroyed.a446d100        Effecta44601-05        You cast slow.a44606-10        You cast faerie fire.a44611-15        You are stunned until the start of your next turna445 believing something awesome just happened.a44616-20        You cast gust of wind.a44621-25        You cast detect thoughts on the target you chose. If you didn't target a creaturea445 you instead take 1d6 psychic damage.a44626-30        You cast stinking cloud.a44631-33        Heavy rain falls in a 60-foot radius centered on the target. The area becomes lightly obscured. The rain falls until the start of your next turn.a44634-36        An animal appears in the unoccupied space nearest the target. The animal isn't under your control and acts as it normally would. Roll a d100 to determine which animal appears. On a 01-25a445 a rhinoceros appears; on a 26-50a445 an elephant appears; and on a 51-100a445 a rat appears.a44637-46        You cast lightning bolt.a44647-49        A cloud of 600 oversized butterflies fills a 30-foot radius centered on the target. The area becomes heavily obscured. The butterflies remain for 10 minutes.a44650-53        You enlarge the target as if you had cast enlarge/reduce. If the target can't be affected by that spell or if you didn't target a creaturea445 you become the target.a44654-58        You cast darkness.a44659-62        Grass grows on the ground in a 60-foot radius centered on the target. If grass is already therea445 it grows to ten times its normal size and remains overgrown for 1 minute.a44663-65        An object of the DM 's choice disappears into the Ethereal Plane. The object must be neither worn nor carrieda445 within 120 feet of the targeta445 and no larger than 10 feet in any dimension.a44666-69        You shrink yourself as if you had cast enlarge/reduce on yourself.a44670-79        You cast fireball.a44680-84        You cast invisibility on yourself.a44685-87        Leaves grow from the target. If you chose a point in space as the targeta445 leaves sprout from the creature nearest to that point. Unless they are picked offa445 the leaves turn brown and fall off after 24 hours.a44688-90        A stream of 1d4 × 10 gemsa445 each worth 1 gpa445 shoots from the wand 's tip in a line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each gem deals 1 bludgeoning damagea445 and the total damage of the gems is divided equally among all creatures in the line.a44691-95        A burst of colorful shimmering light extends from you in a 30-foot radius. You and each creature in the area that can see must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become blinded for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turnsa445 ending the effect on itself on a success.a44696-97        The target's skin turns bright blue for 1d10 days. If you chose a point in spacea445 the creature nearest to that point is affected.a44698-00        If you targeted a creaturea445 it must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. If you didn't target a creaturea445 you become the target and must make the saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or morea445 the target is instantly petrified. On any other failed savea445 the target is restrained and begins to turn to stone. While restrained in this waya445 the target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turna445 becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the target is freed by the greater restoration spell or similar magic.

Name: Wand of Polymorph
Description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cast the polymorph spell (save DC 15) from it.a446The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

Name: Staff (All staves may be used as Quarterstaves)
Staff of Adornment
Description: If you place an object weighing no more than 1 pound (such as a shard of crystala445 an egga445 or a stone) above the tip of the staff while holding ita445 the object floats an inch from the staff's tip and remains there until it is removed or until the staff is no longer in your possession. The staff can have up to three such objects floating over its tip at any given time. While holding the staffa445 you can make one or more of the objects slowly spin or turn in place.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of Birdcalls
Description: This wooden staff is decorated with bird carvings. It has 10 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 charge from the staff and cause it to create one of the following sounds out to a range of 60 feet: a finch's chirpa445 a raven's cawa445 a duck's quacka445 a chicken's clucka445 a goose's booka445 a loon's calla445 a turkey's gobblea445 a seagull's crya445 an owl's hoota445 or an eagle's shriek.a446The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the staff explodes in a harmless cloud of bird feathers and is lost forever.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of Flowers
Description: This wooden staff has 10 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 charge from the staff and cause a flower to sprout from a patch of earth or soil within 5 feet of youa445 or from the staff itself. Unless you choose a specific kind of flowera445 the staff creates a mildscented daisy. The flower is harmless and nonmagicala445 and it grows or withers as a normal flower would. The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the staff turns into flower petals and is lost forever.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Skyblinder Staff
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic quarterstaff. While holding ita445 you gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls.a446If a flying creature you can see within 30 feet of you makes an attack roll against youa445 you can use your reaction to hold the staff aloft and cause it to flare with light. The attacker has disadvantage on the attack rolla445 and it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of its next turn.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of the Adder
Description: You can use a bonus action to speak this staff's command word and make the head of the staff become that of an animate poisonous snake for 1 minute. By using another bonus action to speak the command word againa445 you return the staff to its normal inanimate form.a446You can make a melee attack using the snake heada445 which has a reach of 5 feet. Your proficiency bonus applies to the attack roll. On a hita445 the target takes 1d6 piercing damage and must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 3d6 poison damage.a446The snake head can be attacked while it is animate. It has an Armor Class of 15 and 20 hit points. If the head drops to 0 hit pointsa445 the staff is destroyed. As long as it's not destroyeda445 the staff regains all lost hit points when it reverts to its inanimate form.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of the Python
Description: You can use an action to speak this staff's command word and throw the staff on the ground within 10 feet of you. The staff becomes a giant constrictor snake under your control and acts on its own initiative count. By using a bonus action to speak the command word againa445 you return the staff to its normal form in a space formerly occupied by the snake.a446On your turna445 you can mentally command the snake if it is within 60 feet of you and you aren't incapacitated. You decide what action the snake takes and where it moves during its next turna445 or you can issue it a general commanda445 such as to attack your enemies or guard a location.a446If the snake is reduced to 0 hit pointsa445 it dies and reverts to its staff form. The staff then shatters and is destroyed. If the snake reverts to staff form before losing all its hit pointsa445 it regains all of them.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Gulthias Staff
Description: Made from the branch of a Gulthias tree (see the blights entry of the Monster Manual)a445 a Gulthias staff is a spongya445 black length of wood. Its evil makes beasts visibly uncomfortable while within 30 feet of it. The staff has 10 charges and regains 1d6 + 4 of its expended charges daily at dusk.a446If the staff is broken or burned to ashesa445 its wood releases a terriblea445 inhuman scream that can be heard out to a range of 300 feet. All blights that can hear the scream immediately wither and die.a446Vampiric Strike. The staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff. On a hita445 it deals damage as a normal quarterstaffa445 and you can expend 1 charge to regain a number of hit points equal to the damage dealt by the weapon. Each time a charge is spenta445 red blood oozes from the staff's poresa445 and you must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be afflicted with short term madness (see Madness in chapter 8 of the Dungeon Master's Guide).a446Blight Bane. While you are attuned to the staffa445 blights and other evil plant creatures don't regard you as hostile unless you harm them.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Spider Staff
Description: The top of this blacka445 adamantine staff is shaped like a spider. The staff weighs 6 pounds. You must be attuned to the staff to gain its benefits and cast its spells. The staff can be wielded as a quarterstaff. It deals 1d6 extra poison damage on a hit when used to make a weapon attack.a446The staff has 10 chargesa445 which are used to fuel the spells within it. With the staff in handa445 you can use your action to cast one of the following spells from the staff if the spell is on your class's spell list: spider climb (1 charge) or web (2 chargesa445 spell save DC 15). No components are required.a446The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges each day at dusk. If you expend the staff's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the staff crumbles to dust and is destroyed.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of Charming
Description: While holding this staffa445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its 10 charges to cast charm persona445 commanda445 or comprehend languages from it using your spell save DC. The staff can also be used as a magic quarterstaff.a446If you are holding the staff and fail a saving throw against an enchantment spell that targets only youa445 you can turn your failed save into a successful one. You can't use this property of the staff again until the next dawn. If you succeed on a save against an enchantment spell that targets only youa445 with or without the staff's interventiona445 you can use your reaction to expend 1 charge from the staff and turn the spell back on its caster as if you had cast the spell.a446The staff regains 1d8 + 2 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the staff becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of Defense
Description: This slendera445 hollow staff is made of glass yet is as strong as oak. It weighs 3 pounds. You must be attuned to the staff to gain its benefits and cast its spells.a446While holding the staffa445 you have a +1 bonus to your Armor Class.a446The staff has 10 chargesa445 which are used to fuel the spells within it. With the staff in handa445 you can use your action to cast one of the following spells from the staff if the spell is on your class's spell list: mage armor (1 charge) or shield (2 charges). No components are required.a446The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges each day at dawn. If you expend the staff's last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the staff shatters and is destroyed.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of Healing
Spells Needed: Cure Wounds  Lesser Restoration  Mass Cure Wounds
Description: This staff has 10 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from ita445 using your spell save DC and spellcasting ability modifier: cure wounds (1 charge per spell levela445 up to 4th)a445 lesser restoration (2 charges). or mass cure wounds (5 charges).a446The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1. the staff vanishes in a flash of lighta445 lost forever.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of Swarming Insects
Description: This staff has 10 charges and regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 a swarm of insects consumes and destroys the staffa445 then disperses.a446Spells. While holding the staffa445 you can use an action to expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells from ita445 using your spell save DC: giant insect (4 charges) or insect plague (5 charges).a446Insect Cloud. While holding the staffa445 you can use an action and expend 1 charge to cause a swarm of harmless flying insects to spread out in a 30-foot radius from you. The insects remain for 10 minutesa445 making the area heavily obscured for creatures other than you. The swarm moves with youa445 remaining centered on you. A wind of at least 10 miles per hour disperses the swarm and ends the effect.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of the Woodlands
Spells Needed: animal friendship  awaken  barkskin  locate animals or plants  speak with animals  speak with plants  wall of thorns  pass without trace
Description: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. While holding ita445 you have a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls.a446The staff has 10 charges for the following properties. It regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the staff loses its properties and becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.a446Spells. You can use an action to expend 1 or more of the staff's charges to cast one of the following spells from ita445 using your spell save DC: animal friendship (1 charge)a445 awaken (5 charges)a445 barkskin (2 charges)a445 locate animals or plants (2 charges)a445 speak with animals (1 charge)a445 speak with plants (3 charges)a445 or wall of thorns (6 charges).a446You can also use an action to cast the pass without trace spell from the staff without using any charges.a446Tree Form. You can use an action to plant one end of the staff in fertile earth and expend 1 charge to transform the staff into a healthy tree. The tree is 60 feet tall and has a 5-foot-diameter trunka445 and its branches at the top spread out in a 20-foot radius. The tree appears ordinary but radiates a faint aura of transmutation magic if targeted by detect magic. While touching the tree and using another action to speak its command worda445 you return the staff to its normal form. Any creature in the tree falls when it reverts to a staff.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of Withering
Description: This staff has 3 charges and regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.a446The staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff. On a hita445 it deals damage as a normal quarterstaffa445 and you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra 2d10 necrotic damage to the target. In additiona445 the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage for 1 hour on any ability check or saving throw that uses Strength or Constitution.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of Fire
Spells Needed: Burning Hands  Fireball  Wall of Fire
Description: You have resistance to fire damage while you hold this staff.a446The staff has 10 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from ita445 using your spell save DC: burning hands (1 charge)a445 fireball (3 charges)a445 or wall of fire (4 charges).a446The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the staff blackensa445 crumbles into cindersa445 and is destroyed.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of Frost
Spells Needed: Cone of Cold  Fog Cloud  Ice Storm  Wall of Ice
Description: You have resistance to cold damage while you hold this staff.a446The staff has 10 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from ita445 using your spell save DC: cone of cold (5 charges)a445 fog cloud (1 charge)a445 ice storm (4 charges)a445 or wall of ice (4 charges).a446The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1. the staff turns to water and is destroyed.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of Power
Spells Needed: Cone of Cold  Fireball  Globe of Invulnrability  Hold Monster  Levitate  Lightning Bolt  Mahic Missile  Ray of Enfeeblement  Wall of Force
Description: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. While holding ita445 you gain a +2 bonus to Armor Classa445 saving throwsa445 and spell attack rolls.a446The staff has 20 charges for the following properties. The staff regains 2d8 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the staff retains its +2 bonus to attack and damage roll but loses all other properties. On a 20a445 the staff regain 1d8 + 2 charges.a446Power Strike. When you hit with a melee attack using the staffa445 you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra 1d6 force damage to the target.a446Spells. While holding this staffa445 you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from ita445 using your spell save DC and spell attack bonus: cone of cold (5 charges)a445 fireball (5th-level versiona445 5 charges)a445 globe of invulnerability (6 charges)a445 hold monster (5 charges)a445 levitate (2 charges). lightning bolt (5th-level versiona445 5 charges)a445 magic missile (1 charge)a445 ray of enfeeblement (1 charge)a445 or wall of force (5 charges).a446Retributive Strike. You can use an action to break the staff over your knee or against a solid surfacea445 performing a retributive strike. The staff is destroyed and releases its remaining magic in an explosion that expands to fill a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on it.a446You have a 50 percent chance to instantly travel to a random plane of existencea445 avoiding the explosion. If you fail to avoid the effecta445 you take force damage equal to 16 × the number of charges in the staff. Every other creature in the area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed savea445 a creature takes an amount of damage based on how far away it is from the point of origina445 as shown in the following table. On a successful savea445 a creature takes half as much damage.a446Distance from Origin        Effecta44610 ft. away or closer        8 × the number of charges in the staffa44611 to 20 ft. away        6 × the number of charges in the staffa44621 to 30 ft. away        4 × the number of charges in the staffa446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of Striking
Description: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it.a446The staff has 10 charges. When you hit with a melee attack using ita445 you can expend up to 3 of its charges. For each charge you expenda445 the target takes an extra 1d6 force damage. The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the staff becomes a nonmagical quarterstaff.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of Thunder and Lightning
Description: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. It also has the following additional properties. When one of these properties is useda445 it can't be used again until the next dawn.a446Lightning. When you hit with a melee attack using the staffa445 you can cause the target to take an extra 2d6 lightning damage.a446Thunder. When you hit with a melee attack using the staffa445 you can cause the staff to emit a crack of thundera445 audible out to 300 feet. The target you hit must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or become stunned until the end of your next turn.a446Lightning Strike. You can use an action to cause a bolt of lightning to leap from the staff's tip in a line that is 5 feet wide and 120 feet long. Each creature in that line must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throwa445 taking 9d6 lightning damage on a failed savea445 or half as much damage on a successful one.a446Thunderclap. You can use an action to cause the staff to issue a deafening thunderclapa445 audible out to 600 feet. Each creature within 60 feet of you (not including you) must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed savea445 a creature takes 2d6 thunder damage and becomes deafened for 1 minute. On a successful savea445 a creature takes half damage and isn't deafened.a446Thunder and Lightning. You can use an action to use the Lightning Strike and Thunderclap properties at the same time. Doing so doesn't expend the daily use of those propertiesa445 only the use of this one.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Voyager Staff
Spells Needed: banishment blink  misty step  passwall  teleport
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic quarterstaff. While you hold ita445 you gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls.a446This staff has 10 charges. While holding ita445 you can use an action to expend 1 or more of the staff's charges to cast one of the following spells from ita445 using your spell save DC: banishment (4 charges)a445 blink (3 charges)a445 misty step (2 charges)a445 passwall (5 charges)a445 or teleport (7 charges).a446The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the staff vanishes forever.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Blackstaff
Spells Needed: cone of cold (5 charges)a445 fireball (5th-level versiona445 5 charges)a445 globe of invulnerability (6 charges)a445 hold monster (5 charges)a445 levitate (2 charges). lightning bolt (5th-level versiona445 5 charges)a445 magic missile (1 charge)a445 ray of enfeeblement (1 charge)a445 or wall of force (5 charges).
Description: The Blackstaff is a sentienta445 rune-carved staff set with thin silver veins. It is the symbol of office for the Blackstaffa445 the highest-ranking wizard in Waterdeep. As the rightful owner of the Blackstaffa445 Vajra Safahr is the only one who can become attuned to it. The staff cana445 howevera445 choose a new owner (see Personality below).a446This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. While holding ita445 you gain a +2 bonus to Armor Classa445 saving throwsa445 and spell attack rolls.a446The staff has 20 charges for the following properties. The staff regains 2d8 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 1a445 the staff retains its +2 bonus to attack and damage roll but loses all other properties. On a 20a445 the staff regain 1d8 + 2 charges.a446Power Strike. When you hit with a melee attack using the staffa445 you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra 1d6 force damage to the target.a446Spells. While holding this staffa445 you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from ita445 using your spell save DC and spell attack bonus: cone of cold (5 charges)a445 fireball (5th-level versiona445 5 charges)a445 globe of invulnerability (6 charges)a445 hold monster (5 charges)a445 levitate (2 charges). lightning bolt (5th-level versiona445 5 charges)a445 magic missile (1 charge)a445 ray of enfeeblement (1 charge)a445 or wall of force (5 charges).a446Retributive Strike. You can use an action to break the staff over your knee or against a solid surfacea445 performing a retributive strike. The staff is destroyed and releases its remaining magic in an explosion that expands to fill a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on it.a446You have a 50 percent chance to instantly travel to a random plane of existencea445 avoiding the explosion. If you fail to avoid the effecta445 you take force damage equal to 16 × the number of charges in the staff. Every other creature in the area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed savea445 a creature takes an amount of damage based on how far away it is from the point of origina445 as shown in the following table. On a successful savea445 a creature takes half as much damage.a446Distance from Origin        Effecta44610 ft. away or closer        8 × the number of charges in the staffa44611 to 20 ft. away        6 × the number of charges in the staffa44621 to 30 ft. away        4 × the number of charges in the staffa446Animate Walking Statues. You can expend 1 or more of the staff's charges as an action to animate or deactivate one or more of the walking statues of Waterdeep. You must be in the city to use this propertya445 and you can animate or deactivate one statue for each charge expended. An animated statue obeys the telepathic commands of Khelben Arunsun's spirita445 which is trapped inside the staff (see Personality below). A walking statue becomes inanimate if deactivated or if the staff is broken.a446Dispel Magic. You can expend 1 of the staff's charges as a bonus action to cast dispel magic on a creaturea445 an objecta445 or a magical effect that you touch with the tip of the staff. If the target is an unwilling creature or an object in the possession of such a creaturea445 you must hit the creature with a melee attack using the Blackstaff before you can expend the charge to cast the spell.a446Drain Magic. This property affects only creatures that use spell slots. When you hit such a creature with a melee attack using the Blackstaffa445 you can expend 1 of the staff's charges as a bonus actiona445 causing the target to expend one spell slot of the highest spell level it can cast without casting a spell. If the target has already expended all its spell slotsa445 nothing happens. Spell slots that are expended in this fashion are regained when the target finishes a long resta445 as normal.a446Master of Enchantment. When you cast an enchantment spell of 1st level or higher while holding the staffa445 you can make an Intelligence (Arcana) check with a DC of 10 + the level of the spell. If the check succeedsa445 you cast the spell without expending a spell slot.a446Sentience. The Blackstaff is a sentient staff of neutral alignmenta445 with an Intelligence of 22a445 a Wisdom of 15a445 and a Charisma of 18. It has hearing and darkvision out to a range of 120 feeta445 and it can communicate telepathically with any creature that is holding it.a446Personality. The staff has the spirits of all previous Blackstaffs trapped within it. Its creatora445 Khelben Arunsuna445 is the dominant personality among them. Like Khelbena445 the staff is extremely devious and manipulative. It prefers to counsel its owner without exerting outright control. The staff's primary goal is to protect Waterdeep and its Open Lorda445 currently Laeral Silverhand. Its secondary goal is to help its wielder become more powerful.a446In the event that the holder of the office of the Blackstaff no longer serves the staff's wishesa445 the staff ceases to function until it finds a worthy inheritor—someone whose loyalty to Waterdeep is beyond reproach.a446Spirit Trap. When the Blackstaff diesa445 the spirit of that individual becomes trapped in the staff along with the spirits of the previous Blackstaffs. (A Blackstaff whose spirit is trapped in the staff can't be raised from the dead.)a446Destroying the staff would release the spirits trapped inside ita445 but in that eventa445 Khelben's spirit can lodge itself inside any one piece of the staff that remains. The piece containing Khelben's spirit has the staff's Sentience property but none of its other properties. As long as this piece of the staff existsa445 Khelben's spirit can make the staff whole again whenever he wishes. When the staff is remadea445 the spirits of the previous Blackstaffs become trapped inside it again.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Dragonstaff of Anghairon
Description: While holding the dragonstaff of Ahghairona445 you have advantage on saving throws against the spells and breath weapons of dragonsa445 as well as the breath weapons of other creatures of the dragon type (such as dragon turtles).a446A creature of the dragon type that you touch with the staff can move through the city of Waterdeepa445 ignoring Ahghairon's dragonward (see Ahghairon's Dragonwarda445 in the Introduction). This effect lasts until the creature is touched again by the staff or until a time you proclaim when you confer the benefit.a446The staff has 10 charges. While holding ita445 you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the command spell. If you target a dragon with this castinga445 the dragon has disadvantage on its saving throw. The staff regains 1d10 charges daily at dawn.a446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Staff of the Magi
Spells Needed: Conjure Elemental  Dispel Magic  Fireball  Flaming Sphere  Ice Storm  Invisibility  Knock  Lightningbolt  Passwall  Telekinesis  Plane Shift  Wall of Fire  Web  Arcane Lock  Detect Magic  Enlarge/Reduce  Light  Mage Hand  Protection from Good and Evil
Description: This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. While you hold ita445 you gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls.a446The staff has 50 charges for the following properties. It regains 4d6 + 2 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last chargea445 roll a d20. On a 20a445 the staff regains 1d12 + 1 charges.a446Spell Absorption. While holding the staffa445 you have advantage on saving throws against spells. In additiona445 you can use your reaction when another creature casts a spell that targets only you. If you doa445 the staff absorbs the magic of the spella445 canceling its effect and gaining a number of charges equal to the absorbed spell's level. Howevera445 if doing so brings the staff's total number of charges above 50a445 the staff explodes as if you activated its retributive strike (see below).a446Spells. While holding the staffa445 you can use an action to expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells from ita445 using your spell save DC and spellcasting ability: conjure elemental (7 charges)a445 dispel magic (3 charges)a445 fireball (7th-level versiona445 7 charges)a445 flaming sphere (2 charges)a445 ice storm (4 charges)a445 invisibility (2 charges)a445 knock (2 charges)a445 lightning bolt (7th-level versiona445 7 charges)a445 passwall (5 charges)a445 plane shift (7 charges)a445 telekinesis (5 charges)a445 wall of fire (4 charges)a445 or web (2 charges).a446You can also use an action to cast one of the following spells from the staff without using any charges: arcane locka445 detect magica445 enlarge/reducea445 lighta445 mage handa445 or protection from evil and good.a446Retributive Strike. You can use an action to break the staff over your knee or against a solid surfacea445 performing a retributive strike. The staff is destroyed and releases its remaining magic in an explosion that expands to fill a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on it.a446You have a 50 percent chance to instantly travel to a random plane of existencea445 avoiding the explosion. If you fail to avoid the effecta445 you take force damage equal to 16 × the number of charges in the staff. Every other creature in the area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed savea445 a creature takes an amount of damage based on how far away it is from the point of origina445 as shown in the following table. On a successful savea445 a creature takes half as much damage.a446Distance from Origin        Damagea44610 ft. away or closer        8 × the number of charges in the staffa44611 to 20 ft. away        6 × the number of charges in the staffa44621 to 30 ft. away        4 × the number of charges in the staffa446Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Name: Guild Signet
Description: A guild signet is sometimes awarded to a guild member whose renown score in that guild is 5 or highera445 as a reward for performing special services for the guild. Aside from its magical propertiesa445 the ring is also an indicator of the guild's recognition and favor.a446Multiple variations of this item exista445 as listed below:a446Azorius Guild Signeta446Boros Guild Signeta446Dimir Guild Signeta446Golgari Guild Signeta446Gruul Guild Signeta446Izzet Guild Signeta446Orzhov Guild Signeta446Rakdos Guild Signeta446Selesnya Guild Signeta446Simic Guild Signet

Name: Ring of Jumping
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you can cast the jump spell from it as a bonus action at willa445 but can target only yourself when you do so.

Name: Ring of Mind Sheilding
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you are immune to magic that allows other creatures to read your thoughtsa445 determine whether you are lyinga445 know your alignmenta445 or know your creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with you only if you allow it.a446You can use an action to cause the ring to become invisible until you use another action to make it visiblea445 until you remove the ringa445 or until you die.a446If you die while wearing the ringa445 your soul enters ita445 unless it already houses a soul. You can remain in the ring or depart for the afterlife. As long as your soul is in the ringa445 you can telepathically communicate with any creature wearing it. A wearer can't prevent this telepathic communication.

Name: Ring of Swimming
Description: You have a swimming speed of 40 feet while wearing this ring.

Name: Ring of Truth Telling
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks to determine whether someone is lying to you.

Name: Ring of Warmth
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you have resistance to cold damage. In additiona445 you and everything you wear and carry are unharmed by temperatures as low as -50 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: Ring of Water Walking
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you can stand on and move across any liquid surface as if it were solid ground.

Name: Ring of Animal Influence
Spells Needed: Animal Friendship Fear Speak Iwth Animals
Description: This ring has 3 chargesa445 and it regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ringa445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cast one of the following spells:a446Animal friendship (save DC 13)a446Fear (save DC 13)a445 targeting only beasts that have an Intelligence of 3 or lowera446Speak with animals

Name: Ring of Evasion
Description: This ring has 3 chargesa445 and it regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. When you fail a Dexterity saving throw while wearing ita445 you can use your reaction to expend 1 of its charges to succeed on that saving throw instead.

Name: Ring of Feather Falling
Description: When you fall while wearing this ringa445 you descend 60 feet per round and take no damage from falling.

Name: Ring of Free Action
Description: While you wear this ringa445 difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement. In additiona445 magic can neither reduce your speed nor cause you to be paralyzed or restrained.

Name: Ring of Protection
Description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while wearing this ring.

Name: Ring of Resistance
Description: You have resistance to a type damage while wearing this ring.a446Multiple variations of this item exista445 as listed below:a446Ring of Acid Resistancea446Ring of Cold Resistancea446Ring of Fire Resistancea446Ring of Force Resistancea446Ring of Lightning Resistancea446Ring of Necrotic Resistancea446Ring of Poison Resistancea446Ring of Psychic Resistancea446Ring of Radiant Resistancea446Ring of Thunder Resistance

Name: Ring of Spell Storing
Description: This ring stores spells cast into ita445 holding them until the attuned wearer uses them. The ring can store up to 5 levels worth of spells at a time. When founda445 it contains 1d6 - 1 levels of stored spells chosen by the DM.a446Any creature can cast a spell of 1st through 5th level into the ring by touching the ring as the spell is cast. The spell has no effecta445 other than to be stored in the ring. If the ring can't hold the spella445 the spell is expended without effect. The level of the slot used to cast the spell determines how much space it uses.a446While wearing this ringa445 you can cast any spell stored in it. The spell uses the slot levela445 spell save DCa445 spell attack bonusa445 and spellcasting ability of the original castera445 but is otherwise treated as if you cast the spell. The spell cast from the ring is no longer stored in ita445 freeing up space.

Name: Ring of the Ram
Description: This ring has 3 chargesa445 and it regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ringa445 you can use an action to expend 1 to 3 of its charges to attack one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The ring produces a spectral ram's head and makes its attack roll with a +7 bonus. On a hita445 for each charge you spenda445 the target takes 2d10 force damage and is pushed 5 feet away from you.a446Alternativelya445 you can expend 1 to 3 of the ring's charges as an action to try to break an object you can see within 60 feet of you that isn't being worn or carried. The ring makes a Strength check with a +5 bonus for each charge you spend.

Name: Ring of X-Ray Vision
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you can use an action to speak its command word. When you do soa445 you can see into and through solid matter for 1 minute. This vision has a radius of 30 feet. To youa445 solid objects within that radius appear transparent and don't prevent light from passing through them. The vision can penetrate 1 foot of stonea445 1 inch of common metala445 or up to 3 feet of wood or dirt. Thicker substances block the visiona445 as does a thin sheet of lead.a446Whenever you use the ring again before taking a long resta445 you must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of exhaustion.

Name: Ring of Regeneration
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you regain 1d6 hit points every 10 minutesa445 provided that you have at least 1 hit point. If you lose a body parta445 the ring causes the missing part to regrow and return to full functionality after 1d6 + 1 days if you have at least 1 hit point the whole time.

Name: Ring of Shooting Stars
Description: While wearing this ring in dim light or darknessa445 you can cast dancing lights and light from the ring at will. Casting either spell from the ring requires an action.a446The ring has 6 charges for the following other properties. The ring regains 1d6 expended charges daily at dawn.a446Faerie Fire. You can expend 1 charge as an action to cast faerie fire from the ring.a446Ball Lightning. You can expend 2 charges as an action to create one to four 3-foot-diameter spheres of lightning. The more spheres you createa445 the less powerful each sphere is individually.a446Each sphere appears in an unoccupied space you can see within 120 feet of you. The spheres last as long as you concentrate (as if concentrating on a spell)a445 up to 1 minute. Each sphere sheds dim light in a 30-foot radius.a446As a bonus actiona445 you can move each sphere up to 30 feeta445 but no farther than 120 feet away from you. When a creature other than you comes within 5 feet of a spherea445 the sphere discharges lightning at that creature and disappears. That creature must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed savea445 the creature takes lightning damage based on the number of spheres you created. (4 spheres = 2d4a445 3 spheres = 2d6a445 2 spheres = 5d4a445 1 sphere = 4d12)a446Shooting Stars.a446You can expend 1 to 3 charges as an action. For every charge you expenda445 you launch a glowing mote of light from the ring at a point you can see within 60 feet of you. Each creature within a 15-foot cube originating from that point is showered in sparks and must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throwa445 taking 5d4 fire damage on a failed savea445 or half as much damage on a successful one.

Name: Ring of Telekinesis
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you can cast the telekinesis spell at willa445 but you can target only objects that aren't being worn or carried.

Name: Ring of Djinni Summoning
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you can speak its command word as an action to summon a particular djinni from the Elemental Plane of Air. The djinni appears in an unoccupied space you choose within 120 feet of you. It remains as long as you concentrate (as if concentrating on a spell)a445 to a maximum of 1 houra445 or until it drops to 0 hit points. It then returns to its home plane.a446While summoneda445 the djinni is friendly to you and your companions. It obeys any commands you give ita445 no matter what language you use. If you fail to command ita445 the djinni defends itself against attackers but takes no other actions.a446After the djinni departsa445 it can't be summoned again for 24 hoursa445 and the ring becomes nonmagical if the djinni dies.

Name: Ring of Air Elemental Command
Spells Needed: Chain Lightning Gust of Wind Wind Wall
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you have advantage on attack rolls against elementals from the Elemental Plane of Aira445 and they have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. In additiona445 you have access to properties based on the Elemental Plane of Air.a446The ring has 5 charges. It regains 1d4 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. Spells cast from the ring have a save DC of 17.a446You can expend 2 of the ring's charges to cast dominate monster on an air elemental. In additiona445 when you falla445 you descend 60 feet per round and take no damage from falling. You can also speak and understand Auran.a446If you help slay an air elemental while attuned to the ringa445 you gain access to the following additional properties:a446You have resistance to lightning damage.a446You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed and can hover.a446You can cast the following spells from the ringa445 expending the necessary number of charges: chain lightning (3 charges)a445 gust of wind (2 charges)a445 or wind wall (1 charge).

Name: Ring of Earth Elemental Command
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you have advantage on attack rolls against elementals from the Elemental Plane of Earth and they have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. In additiona445 you have access to properties based on the Elemental Plane of Earth.a446The ring has 5 charges. It regains 1d4 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. Spells cast from the ring have a save DC of 17.a446You can expend 2 of the ring's charges to cast dominate monster on an earth elemental. In additiona445 you can move in difficult terrain that is composed of rubblea445 rocksa445 or dirt as if it were normal terrain. You can also speak and understand Terran.a446If you help slay an earth elemental while attuned to the ringa445 you gain access to the following additional properties:a446You have resistance to acid damage.a446You can move through solid earth or rock as if those areas were difficult terrain. If you end your turn therea445 you are shunted out to the nearest unoccupied space you last occupied.a446You can cast the following spells from the ringa445 expending the necessary number of charges: stone shape (2 charges)a445 stoneskin (3 charges)a445 or wall of stone (3 charges).

Name: Ring of Fire Elemental Command
Spells Needed: Burning Hands Fireball Wall of Fire
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you have advantage on attack rolls against elementals from the Elemental Plane of Fire and they have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. In additiona445 you have access to properties based on the Elemental Plane of Fire.a446The ring has 5 charges. It regains 1d4 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. Spells cast from the ring have a save DC of 17.a446You can expend 2 of the ring's charges to cast dominate monster on a fire elemental. In additiona445 you have resistance to fire damage. You can also speak and understand Ignan.a446If you help slay a fire elemental while attuned to the ringa445 you gain access to the following additional properties:a446You are immune to fire damage.a446You can cast the following spells from the ringa445 expending the necessary number of charges: burning hands (1 charge)a445 fireball (2 charges)a445 and wall of fire (3 charges).

Name: Ring of Invisibility
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you can turn invisible as an action. Anything you are wearing or carrying is invisible with you. You remain invisible until the ring is removeda445 until you attack or cast a spella445 or until you use a bonus action to become visible again.

Name: Ring of Spell Turning
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you have advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only you (not in an area of effect). In additiona445 if you roll a 20 for the save and the spell is 7th level or lowera445 the spell has no effect on you and instead targets the castera445 using the slot levela445 spell save DCa445 attack bonusa445 and spellcasting ability of the caster.

Name: Ring of Water Elemental Command
Spells Needed: create or destroy water control water  ice storm wall of ice
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you have advantage on attack rolls against elementals from the Elemental Plane of Water and they have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. In additiona445 you have access to properties based on the Elemental Plane of Water.a446The ring has 5 charges. It regains 1d4 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. Spells cast from the ring have a save DC of 17.a446You can expend 2 of the ring's charges to cast dominate monster on a water elemental. In additiona445 you can stand on and walk across liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground. You can also speak and understand Aquan.a446If you help slay a water elemental while attuned to the ringa445 you gain access to the following additional properties:a446You can breathe underwater and have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.a446You can cast the following spells from the ringa445 expending the necessary number of charges: create or destroy water (1 charge)a445 control water (3 charges)a445 ice storm (2 charges)a445 or wall of ice (3 charges).

Name: Ring of Three Wishes
Description: While wearing this ringa445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its 3 charges to cast the wish spell from it. The ring becomes nonmagical when you use the last charge.

Name: Dread Helm
Description: This fearsome steel helm makes your eyes glow red while you wear it.

Name: Hat of Vermin
Description: This hat has 3 charges. While holding the hata445 you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges and speak a command word that summons your choice of a bata445 a froga445 or a rat.
