This effect applies only if the spell has a somatic or a material component.a446All instruments of the bards can be used to cast the following spells: flya445 invisibilitya445 levitatea445 and protection from evil and good.a446In additiona445 the Fochlucan bandore can be used to cast entanglea445 faerie firea445 shillelagha445 and speak with animals.a446If you have proficiency with a given musical instrumenta445 you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument.a446A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focusa445 substituting it for any material component that does not list a cost.a446Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.a446See the Tool Proficiencies entry for more information.a446Proficiency with a musical instrument indicates you are familiar with the techniques used to play it. You also have knowledge of some songs commonly performed with that instrument.a446History. Your expertise aids you in recalling lore related to your instrument.a446Performance. Your ability to put on a good show is improved when you incorporate an instrument into your act.a446Compose a Tune. As part of a long resta445 you can compose a new tune and lyrics for your instrument. You might use this ability to impress a noble or spread scandalous rumors with a catchy tune.a446Musical Instrumenta446Activity        DCa446Identify a tune        10a446Improvise a tune        20

Name: Instrument of the Bard – Mac-Fuirmidh Cittern
Description: An instrument of the bards is an exquisite example of its kinda445 superior to an ordinary instrument in every way. Seven types of these instruments exista445 each named after a legendary bard college. A creature that attempts to play the instrument without being attuned to it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 2d4 psychic damage.a446You can use an action to play the instrument and cast one of its spells. Once the instrument has been used to cast a spella445 it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn. The spells use your spellcasting ability and spell save DC.a446You can play the instrument while casting a spell that causes any of its targets to be charmed on a failed saving throwa445 thereby imposing disadvantage on the save. This effect applies only if the spell has a somatic or a material component.a446All instruments of the bards can be used to cast the following spells: flya445 invisibilitya445 levitatea445 and protection from evil and good.a446In additiona445 the Mac-Fuirmidh cittern can be used to cast barkskina445 cure woundsa445 and fog cloud.a446If you have proficiency with a given musical instrumenta445 you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument.a446A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focusa445 substituting it for any material component that does not list a cost.a446Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.a446See the Tool Proficiencies entry for more information.a446Proficiency with a musical instrument indicates you are familiar with the techniques used to play it. You also have knowledge of some songs commonly performed with that instrument.a446History. Your expertise aids you in recalling lore related to your instrument.a446Performance. Your ability to put on a good show is improved when you incorporate an instrument into your act.a446Compose a Tune. As part of a long resta445 you can compose a new tune and lyrics for your instrument. You might use this ability to impress a noble or spread scandalous rumors with a catchy tune.a446Musical Instrumenta446Activity        DCa446Identify a tune        10a446Improvise a tune        20

Name: Keoghtom’s Ointment (per dose)
Description: This glass jara445 3 inches in diametera445 contains 1d4 + 1 doses of a thick mixture that smells faintly of aloe. The jar and its contents weigh ½ pound.a446As an actiona445 one dose of the ointment can be swallowed or applied to the skin. The creature that receives it regains 2d8 + 2 hit pointsa445 ceases to be poisoneda445 and is cured of any disease.

Name: Lantern of Revealing
Description: While lita445 this hooded lantern burns for 6 hours on 1 pint of oila445 shedding bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Invisible creatures and objects are visible as long as they are in the lantern's bright light. You can use an action to lower the hooda445 reducing the light to dim light in a 5-foot radius.

Name: Night Caller
Description: This whistle is carved from transparent crystala445 and it resembles a tiny dragon curled up like a snail. The name Night Caller is etched on the whistle in Dwarvish runes. If a character succeeds on a DC 20 Intelligence (Arcana or History) checka445 the character recalls lore that says the duergar made several such whistles for various groups in an age past.a446If you blow the whistle in darkness or under the night skya445 it allows you to cast the animate dead spell. The target can be affected through up to 10 feet of soft earth or similar materiala445 and if it isa445 it takes 1 minute to claw its way to the surface to serve you. Once the whistle has animated an undead creaturea445 it can't do so again until 7 days have passed.a446Once every 24 hoursa445 you can blow the whistle to reassert control over one or two creatures you animated with it.

Name: Paper Bird
Description: After you write a message of fifty words or fewer on this magic sheet of parchment and speak a creature's namea445 the parchment magically folds into a Tiny paper bird and flies to the recipient whose name you uttered. The recipient must be on the same plane of existence as youa445 otherwise the bird turns into ash as it takes flight.a446The bird is an object that has 1 hit pointa445 an Armor Class of 13a445 a flying speed of 60 feeta445 a Dexterity of 16 (+3)a445 and a score of 1 (−5) in all other abilitiesa445 and it is immune to poison and psychic damage.a446It travels to within 5 feet of its intended recipient by the most direct routea445 whereupon it turns into a nonmagical and inanimate sheet of parchment that can be unfolded only by the intended recipient. If the bird's hit points or speed is reduced to 0 or if it is otherwise immobilizeda445 it turns into ash.a446Paper birds usually come in smalla445 flat boxes containing 1d6 + 3 sheets of the parchment.

Name: Pearl of Power
Description: While this pearl is on your persona445 you can use an action to speak its command word and regain one expended spell slot. If the expended slot was of 4th level or highera445 the new slot is 3rd level. Once you have used the pearla445 it can't be used again until the next dawn.

Name: Pipes of Haunting
Description: You must be proficient with wind instruments to use these pipes. They have 3 charges. You can use an action to play them and expend 1 charge to create an eeriea445 spellbinding tune. Each creature within 30 feet of you that hears you play must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of you for 1 minute. If you wisha445 all creatures in the area that aren't hostile toward you automatically succeed on the saving throw. A creature that fails the saving throw can repeat it at the end of each of its turnsa445 ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on its saving throw is immune to the effect of these pipes for 24 hours. The pipes regain 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.a446If you have proficiency with a given musical instrumenta445 you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument.a446A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focusa445 substituting it for any material component that does not list a cost.a446Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.a446See the Tool Proficiencies entry for more information.a446Proficiency with a musical instrument indicates you are familiar with the techniques used to play it. You also have knowledge of some songs commonly performed with that instrument.a446History. Your expertise aids you in recalling lore related to your instrument.a446Performance. Your ability to put on a good show is improved when you incorporate an instrument into your act.a446Compose a Tune. As part of a long resta445 you can compose a new tune and lyrics for your instrument. You might use this ability to impress a noble or spread scandalous rumors with a catchy tune.a446Musical Instrumenta446Activity        DCa446Identify a tune        10a446Improvise a tune        20

Name: Pipes of the Sewers
Description: You must be proficient with wind instruments to use these pipes. While you are attuned to the pipesa445 ordinary rats and giant rats are indifferent toward you and will not attack you unless you threaten or harm them.a446The pipes have 3 charges. If you play the pipes as an actiona445 you can use a bonus action to expend 1 to 3 chargesa445 calling forth one swarm of rats with each expended chargea445 provided that enough rats are within half a mile of you to be called in this fashion (as determined by the DM). If there aren't enough rats to form a swarma445 the charge is wasted. Called swarms move toward the music by the shortest available route but aren't under your control otherwise. The pipes regain 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.a446Whenever a swarm of rats that isn't under another creature's control comes within 30 feet of you while you are playing the pipesa445 you can make a Charisma check contested by the swarm's Wisdom check. If you lose the contesta445 the swarm behaves as it normally would and can't be swayed by the pipes' music for the next 24 hours. If you win the contesta445 the swarm is swayed by the pipes' music and becomes friendly to you and your companions for as long as you continue to play the pipes each round as an action. A friendly swarm obeys your commands. If you issue no commands to a friendly swarma445 it defends itself but otherwise takes no actions. If a friendly swarm starts its turn and can't hear the pipes' musica445 your control over that swarm endsa445 and the swarm behaves as it normally would and can't be swayed by the pipes' music for the next 24 hours.a446If you have proficiency with a given musical instrumenta445 you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument.a446A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focusa445 substituting it for any material component that does not list a cost.a446Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.a446See the Tool Proficiencies entry for more information.a446Proficiency with a musical instrument indicates you are familiar with the techniques used to play it. You also have knowledge of some songs commonly performed with that instrument.a446History. Your expertise aids you in recalling lore related to your instrument.a446Performance. Your ability to put on a good show is improved when you incorporate an instrument into your act.a446Compose a Tune. As part of a long resta445 you can compose a new tune and lyrics for your instrument. You might use this ability to impress a noble or spread scandalous rumors with a catchy tune.a446Musical Instrumenta446Activity        DCa446Identify a tune        10a446Improvise a tune        20

Name: Pyroconverger
Description: A Pyroconverger is an Izzet-made flamethrower. It carries a risk of malfunction each time you use it.a446As an actiona445 you can cause the Pyroconverger to project fire in a 10-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throwa445 taking 4d6 fire damage on a failed savea445 or half as much damage on a successful one.a446Each time you use the Pyroconvergera445 roll a d10 and add the number of times you have used it since your last long rest. If the total is 11 or highera445 the Pyroconverger malfunctions: you take 4d6 fire damagea445 and you can't use the Pyroconverger again until you finish a long rest.

Name: Quiver of Ehlonna
Description: Each of the quiver's three compartments connects to an extradimensional space that allows the quiver to hold numerous items while never weighing more than 2 pounds. The shortest compartment can hold up to sixty arrowsa445 boltsa445 or similar objects. The midsize compartment holds up to eighteen javelins or similar objects. The longest compartment holds up to six long objectsa445 such as bowsa445 quarterstaffsa445 or spears.a446You can draw any item the quiver contains as if doing so from a regular quiver or scabbard.

Name: Rakdos Keyrune
Description: This dark granite keyrune is marbled with scarlet veins and carved with the leering visage of a mischievous demon. When activateda445 it transforms into a cackler for up to 1 hour.a446When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of youa445 the keyrune transforms into a cackler. If there isn't enough space for the creaturea445 the keyrune doesn't transform.a446The creature is friendly to youa445 your companionsa445 and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the creature takes the Dodge action and moves to avoid danger.a446At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune forma445 it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

Name: Rope of Climbing
Description: This 60-foot length of silk rope weighs 3 pounds and can hold up to 3a445000 pounds. If you hold one end of the rope and use an action to speak the command worda445 the rope animates. As a bonus actiona445 you can command the other end to move toward a destination you choose. That end moves 10 feet on your turn when you first command it and 10 feet on each of your turns until reaching its destinationa445 up to its maximum length awaya445 or until you tell it to stop. You can also tell the rope to fasten itself securely to an object or to unfasten itselfa445 to knot or unknot itselfa445 or to coil itself for carrying.a446If you tell the rope to knota445 large knots appear at 1-foot intervals along the rope. While knotteda445 the rope shortens to a 50-foot length and grants advantage on checks made to climb it.a446The rope has AC 20 and 20 hit points. It regains 1 hit point every 5 minutes as long as it has at least 1 hit point. If the rope drops to 0 hit pointsa445 it is destroyed.

Name: Saddle of the Cavalier
Description: While in this saddle on a mounta445 you can't be dismounted against your will if you're consciousa445 and attack rolls against the mount have disadvantage.

Name: Sending Stones
Description: Also at rank 1a445 you are given use of an Acquisitions Incorporated sending stonea445 an uncommon magic item that resembles a gemstone in a bold setting. It functions like a normal sending stonea445 except that it has no matching stone and allows communication with Head Officea445 specific secretarians you knowa445 and the secretarian nearest your location. You must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence (Arcana) check to establish contact. Once the stone is successfully useda445 it can't be used again until the next dawn.a446Making contact with another secretarian assumes that they are in possession of their own sending stone.a446Quirks of Your Sending Stonea446d8        quirka4461        It's a flip stone.a4462        It gets great reception everywhere except in your headquarters.a4463        It sometimes picks up other magical conversations.a4464        It's the perfect sizea445 shapea445 and weight to be used as a skipping stone.a4465        It heats up when you use ita445 to the extent that it once burned through your gloves.a4466        It has an obnoxious ringtone that you can't work out how to change.a4467        It fails to notify you of incoming messages except for a faint pulsating glow.a4468        It's voice activateda445 so that every time you talk to someonea445 it tries to send a message to someone else.a446Rumor Mill. Also at rank 2a445 whenever your franchise begins a major quest or missiona445 make a DC 15 Intelligence (History) check. On a successa445 you can learn up to three rumors related to creatures or organizations involved in the missiona445 which come to you through your sending stone. These rumors reflect current or historical knowledge possessed by Acquisitions Incorporated or the organization's many contacts.a446Improved Rumor Mill. At rank 3a445 when you use your Rumor Mill featurea445 the DM provides you with a sense of which parts of a particular rumor are inaccuratea445 if any. You do not necessarily learn the truth behind those false rumors.

Name: Simic Keyrune
Description: This keyrune is assembled from corala445 mother-of-pearla445 and chrome and adorned with the spirals and curves characteristic of Simic ornamentation. The head resembles the shell of a sea creature. On commanda445 the keyrune turns into a category 1 krasis that has the Grabber and Stabilizing Legs adaptations. The transformation lasts for up to 5 hours.a446When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of youa445 the keyrune transforms into a category 1 krasis that has the Grabber and Stabilizing Legs adaptations. If there isn't enough space for the creaturea445 the keyrune doesn't transform.a446The creature is friendly to youa445 your companionsa445 and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the creature takes the Dodge action and moves to avoid danger.a446At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune forma445 it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

Name: Smokepowder
Description: Smokepowder is a magical explosive chiefly used to propel a bullet out of the barrel of a firearm. It is stored in airtight wooden kegs or tinya445 waterproof leather packets. A packet contains enough smokepowder for five shotsa445 and a keg holds enough smokepowder for five hundred shots.a446If smokepowder is set on firea445 droppeda445 or otherwise handled roughlya445 it explodes and deals fire damage to each creature or object within 20 feet of it: 1d6 for a packeta445 9d6 for a keg. A successful DC 12 Dexterity saving throw halves the damage.a446Casting dispel magic on smokepowder renders it permanently inert.

Name: Stone of Ill Luck
Description: This polished agate appears to be a stone of good luck to anyone who tries to identify ita445 and it confers that item's property while on your person.a446Curse. This item is cursed. While it is on your persona445 you take a -2 penalty to ability checks and saving throws. Until the curse is discovereda445 the DM secretly applies this penaltya445 assuming you are adding the item's bonus. You are unwilling to part with the stone until the curse is broken with remove curse or similar magic.

Name: Wind Fan
Description: While holding this fana445 you can use an action to cast the gust of wind spell (save DC 13) from it. Once useda445 the fan shouldn't be used again until the next dawn. Each time it is used again before thena445 it has a cumulative 20 percent chance of not working and tearing into uselessa445 nonmagical tatters.

Name: Azorious Keyrune
Description: This keyrune is carved from white marble and lapis lazuli to resemble a noble bird of prey. It can become a giant eagle for up to 1 hour. While the transformed eagle is within 1 mile of youa445 you can communicate with it telepathically. As an actiona445 you can see through the eagle's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turna445 and you gain the benefit of its keen sight. During this timea445 you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses.a446When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of youa445 the keyrune transforms into a giant eagle. If there isn't enough space for the eaglea445 the keyrune doesn't transform.a446The creature is friendly to youa445 your companionsa445 and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the eagle takes the Dodge action and moves to avoid danger.a446At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune forma445 it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

Name: Badge of the Watch
Description: A badge of the Watch is given only to those who have earned the trust of the Open Lord of Waterdeep. The badgea445 signifying the rank of captain in Waterdeep's City Watcha445 bears the emblem of Waterdeep and is meant to be worn or carried.a446While wearing the badgea445 you gain a +2 bonus to AC if you aren't using a shield.a446If the badge is more than 5 feet away from you for more than 1 minutea445 it vanishes and harmlessly reappears on a surface within 5 feet of the Open Lord. While holding the badgea445 the Open Lord knows your locationa445 provided the two of you are on the same plane of existence and your attunement to the badge hasn't ended.a446As an actiona445 the Open Lord can touch the badge and end your attunement to it.

Name: Bag of Beans
Description: Inside this heavy cloth bag are 3d4 dry beans. The bag weighs 1/2 pound plus 1/4 pound for each bean it contains. If you dump the bag’s contents out on the ground  they explode in a 10-­‐‑foot radius  extending from the beans. Each creature in the area  including you  must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw  taking 5d4 fire damage on a failed save  or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried. If you remove a bean from the bag  plant it in dirt or sand  and then water it  the bean produces an effect 1 minute later from the ground where it was planted. The GM can choose an effect from the following table  determine it randomly  or create an effect.a446d100        Effecta44601        5d4 toadstools sprout. If a creature eats aa446toadstool  roll any die. On an odd roll  thea446eater must succeed on a DC 15 Constitutiona446saving throw or take 5d6 poison damage anda446become poisoned for 1 hour. On an even rolla446the eater gains 5d6 temporary hit points fora4461 hour.a44602-10        A geyser erupts and spouts water  beera446berry juice  tea  vinegar  wine  or oil (GMa445sa446choice) 30 feet into the air for 1d12 rounds.a44611-20        A treant sprouts. Therea445s a 50 percenta446chance that the treant is chaotic evil anda446attacks.a44621-30        An animate  immobile stone statue in youra446likeness rises. It makes verbal threatsa446against you. If you leave it and others comea446near  it describes you as the most heinousa446of villains and directs the newcomers toa446find and attack you. If you are on the samea446plane of existence as the statue  it knowsa446where you are. The statue becomesa446inanimate after 24 hours.a44631-40        A campfire with blue flames springs fortha446and burns for 24 hours (or until it isa446extinguished).a44641-50        1d6 + 6 shriekers sprout.a44651-60        1d4 + 8 bright pink toads crawl forth.a446Whenever a toad is touched  it transformsa446into a Large or smaller monster of the GMa445sa446choice. The monster remains for 1 minutea446then disappears in a puff of bright pinka446smoke.a44661-70        A hungry bulette burrows up and attacks.a44671-80        A fruit tree grows. It has 1d10 + 20 fruita4461d8 of which act as randomly determineda446magic potions  while one acts as ana446ingested poison of the GMa445s choice. Thea446tree vanishes after 1 hour. Picked fruita446remains  retaining any magic for 30 days.a44681-90        A nest of 1d4 + 3 eggs springs up. Anya446creature that eats an egg must make a DCa44620 Constitution saving throw. On aa446successful save  a creature permanentlya446increases its lowest ability score by 1a446randomly choosing among equally lowa446scores. On a failed save  the creature takesa44610d6 force damage from an internal magicala446explosion.a44691-99        A pyramid with a 60-foot-square base burstsa446upward. Inside is a sarcophagus containing aa446mummy lord. The pyramid is treated as thea446mummy lorda445s lair  and its sarcophagusa446contains treasure of the GMa445s choice.a44600        A giant beanstalk sprouts  growing up to aa446height of the GMa445s choice. The top leadsa446where the GM chooses  such as to a greata446view  a cloud gianta445s castle  or a differenta446plane of existence.

Name: Banner of the Krig Rune
Description: Crafted from a thicka445 red fabrica445 this banner measures 5 feet high and 3 feet wide. The krig (war) rune is displayed on the fabric with rounda445 metal plates sewn into it. It can be attached to a 10-foot pole to serve as a standard. Furling or unfurling the banner requires an action. The banner has the following properties.a446Mark of Courage. As a bonus actiona445 you can touch the unfurled banner and cause it to emanate courage. You and your allies are immune to the frightened condition while within 20 feet of it. This benefit lasts for 10 minutes or until the banner is furled. Once you use this propertya445 you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.a446Sentinel Standard. You can see invisible creatures while they are within 20 feet of the unfurled banner and within your line of sight.a446Standard's Shield. As a bonus actiona445 you can touch the unfurled banner and invoke this power. Any ranged attack roll that targets you or an ally of yours has disadvantage if the target is within 20 feet of the unfurled banner. This benefit lasts for 1 minute or until the banner is furled. Once you use this propertya445 you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.a446Gift of Battle. You can transfer the banner's magic to a place by tracing the krig rune on the ground with your finger. The point where you trace it becomes the center of a spherical area of magic that has a 500-foot radius and that is fixed to the place. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the banner to be within 5 feet of you and during which you choose creaturesa445 creature typesa445 or both that will benefit from the magic. At the enda445 the banner is destroyeda445 and the area gains the following property:a446While in the 500-foot-radius spherea445 the creatures you chose during the transfer process are immune to the frightened condition and gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and AC.

Name: Bead of Force
Description: This small black sphere measures 3/4 of an inch in diameter and weighs an ounce. Typically  1d4 + 4 beads of force are found together.a446You can use an action to throw the bead up to 60 feet. The bead explodes on impact and is destroyed. Each creature within a 10-foot radius of where the bead landed must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 5d4 force damage. A sphere of transparent force then encloses the area for 1 minute. Any creature that failed the save and is completely within the area is trapped inside this sphere. Creatures that succeeded on the save  or are partially within the area  are pushed away from the center of the sphere until they are no longer inside it. Only breathable air can pass through the sphere’s wall. No attack or other effect can.a446An enclosed creature can use its action to push against the sphere’s wall  moving the sphere up to half the creature’s walking speed. The sphere can be picked up  and its magic causes it to weigh only 1 pound  regardless of the weight of creatures inside.

Name: Blod Stone
Description: This diamond contains the blood of a creaturea445 blood that appears in the form of the blod (blood) rune. While the item is on your persona445 you can use your action to divine the location of the creature nearest to you that is related to the blood in the item and that isn't undead. You sense the distance and direction of the creature relative to your location. The creature is either the one whose blood is in the item or a blood relative.a446This item is made from a large diamond worth at least 5a445000 gp. When the blood of a creature is poured onto it during the creation processa445 the blood seeps into the heart of the gem. If the gem is destroyeda445 the blood evaporates and is gone forever. A vengeful being might use a blod stone to hunt down an entire bloodline. Such stones are sometimes given as gifts to siblings or handed down from parent to child.

Name: Boros Keyrune
Description: Carved from red sandstone with white granite elements to resemble a member of the Boros Legiona445 this keyrune can become a veteran (human) for up to 8 hours. In addition to fighting on your behalfa445 this veteran cheerfully offers tactical advicea445 which is usually sound. Anyone who talks with the transformed keyrune or examines it closely can easily recognize that it is an artificial human.a446When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of youa445 the keyrune transforms into a veteran (human). If there isn't enough space for the veterana445 the keyrune doesn't transform.a446The creature is friendly to youa445 your companionsa445 and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the creature takes the Dodge action and moves to avoid danger.a446At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune forma445 it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

Name: Bowl of Commanding Water Elementals
Description: While this bowl is filled with water  you can use an action to speak the bowl’s command word and summon a water elemental  as if you had cast the conjure elemental spell. The bowl can’t be used this way again until the next dawn. The bowl is about 1 foot in diameter and half as deep. It weighs 3 pounds and holds about 3 gallons.

Name: Brazier of Commanding Fire Elementals
Description: While a fire burns in this brass braziera445 you can use an action to speak the brazier's command word and summon a fire elementala445 as if you had cast the conjure elemental spell. The brazier can't be used this way again until the next dawn.a446The brazier weighs 5 pounds.

Name: Censer of Controlling Air Elementals
Description: While incense is burning in this censera445 you can use an action to speak the censer's command word and summon an air elementala445 as if you had cast the conjure elemental spell. The censer can't be used this way again until the next dawn.a446This 6-inch-widea445 1-foot-high vessel resembles a chalice with a decorated lid. It weighs 1 pound.

Name: Chime of Opening
Description: This hollow metal tube measures about 1 foot long and weighs 1 pound. You can strike it as an actiona445 pointing it at an object within 120 feet of you that can be openeda445 such as a doora445 lida445 or lock. The chime issues a clear tonea445 and one lock or latch on the object opens unless the sound can't reach the object. If no locks or latches remaina445 the object itself opens.a446The chime can be used ten times. After the tenth time it cracks and becomes useless.

Name: Claw of the Wyrm Rune
Description: This dragon's claw has been covered with a coat of molten silvera445 upon which has been inscribed the wyrm (dragon) rune. The claw has the following properties.a446Wyrmslayer. As an actiona445 you can point the claw at a dragon within 30 feet of you. The dragon must then succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain vulnerability to all damage types until the end of your next turn. This property can be used three times. The claw regains all expended uses at the next dawn.a446Wyrm Shield. While the claw is displayed on your persona445 you have resistance to the damage caused by any dragon's breath weapon.a446Wyrm Ward. You can transfer the c1aw's magic to a place by tracing the wyrm rune on the ground with your finger. The point where you trace it becomes the center of a spherical area of magic that has a 100-foot radius and that is fixed to the place. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the claw to be within 5 feet of you. At the enda445 the claw is destroyeda445 and the area gains the following property:a446While in the 100-foot-radius spherea445 any dragon has disadvantage on saving throws and can have a flying speed no higher than 10 feet.

Name: Cube of Force
Description: This cube is about an inch across. Each face has a distinct marking on it that can be pressed. The cube starts with 36 chargesa445 and it regains 1d20 expended charges daily at dawn.a446You can use an action to press one of the cube's facesa445 expending a number of charges based on the chosen facea445 as shown in the Cube of Force Faces table. Each face has a different effect. If the cube has insufficient charges remaininga445 nothing happens. Otherwisea445 a barrier of invisible force springs into existencea445 forming a cube 15 feet on a side. The barrier is centered on youa445 moves with youa445 and lasts for 1 minutea445 until you use an action to press the cube's sixth facea445 or the cube runs out of charges. You can change the barrier's effect by pressing a different face of the cube and expending the requisite number of chargesa445 resetting the duration. If your movement causes the barrier to come into contact with a solid object that can't pass through the cubea445 you can't move any closer to that object as long as the barrier remains.a446Cube of Force Facesa446Face        Charges        Effecta4461        1        Gasesa445 winda445 and fog can't pass through the barrier.a4462        2        Nonliving matter can't pass through the barrier. Wallsa445 floorsa445 and ceilings can pass through at your discretion.a4463        3        Living matter can't pass through the barrier.a4464        4        Spell effects can't pass through the barrier.a4465        5        Nothing can pass through the barrier. Wallsa445 floorsa445 and ceilings can pass through at your discretion.a4466        0        The barrier deactivates.a446The cube loses charges when the barrier is targeted by certain spells or comes into contact with certain spell or magic item effectsa445 as shown in the table below.a446Spell or item        Charges Losta446Disintegrate        1d12a446Horn of blasting        1d10a446Passwall        1d6a446Prismatic spray        1d20a446Wall of fire        1d4

Name: Daern’s Instant Fortress
Description: You can use an action to place this 1-inch metal cube on the ground and speak its command word. The cube rapidly grows into a fortress that remains until you use an action to speak the command word that dismisses ita445 which works only if the fortress is empty.a446The fortress is a square towera445 20 feet on a side and 30 feet higha445 with arrow slits on all sides and a battlement atop it. Its interior is divided into two floors. with a ladder running along one wall to connect them. The ladder ends at a trapdoor leading to the roof. When activateda445 the tower has a small door on the side facing you. The door opens only at your commanda445 which you can speak as a bonus action. It is immune to the knock spell and similar magica445 such as that of a chime of opening.a446Each creature in the area where the fortress appears must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throwa445 taking 10d10 bludgeoning damage on a failed savea445 or half as much damage on a successful one. In either casea445 the creature is pushed to an unoccupied space outside but next to the fortress. Objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried take this damage and are pushed automatically.a446The tower is made of adamantinea445 and its magic prevents it from being tipped over. The roofa445 the doora445 and the walls each have 100 hit pointsa445 immunity to damage from nonmagical weapons excluding siege weaponsa445 and resistance to all other damage. Only a wish spell can repair the fortress (this use of the spell counts as replicating a spell of 8th level or lower). Each casting of wish causes the roofa445 the doora445 or one wall to regain 50 hit points.

Name: Dimensional Shackles
Description: You can use an action to place these shackles on an incapacitated creature. The shackles adjust to fit a creature of Small to Large size. In addition to serving as mundane manaclesa445 the shackles prevent a creature bound by them from using any method of extradimensional movementa445 including teleportation or travel to a different plane of existence. They don't prevent the creature from passing-through an interdimensional portal.a446You and any creature you designate when you use the shackles can use an action to remove them. Once every 30 daysa445 the bound creature can make a DC 30 Strength (Athletics) check. On a successa445 the creature breaks free and destroys the shackles.

Name: Eagle Whistle
Description: While you blow an eagle whistle continuouslya445 you can fly twice as fast as your walking speed. You can blow the whistle continuously for a number of rounds equal to 5 + five times your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1 round) or until you talka445 hold your breatha445 or start suffocating. A use of the whistle also ends if you land. If you are aloft when you stop blowing the whistlea445 you fall. The whistle has three uses. It regains expended uses daily at dawn.

Name: Feather of Diatryma Summoning
Description: This bright plume is made from the feather of a diatryma (pronounced dee-ah-TRY-mah)a445 a Largea445 colorfula445 flightless bird native to the Underdark. If you use an action to speak the command word and throw the feather into a Large unoccupied space on the ground within 5 feet of youa445 the feather becomes a living diatryma for up to 6 hoursa445 after which it reverts to its feather form. It reverts to feather form early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching the bird.a446When the diatryma reverts to feather forma445 the magic of the feather can't be used again until 7 days have passed.a446The diatryma uses the statistics of an axe beaka445 except that its beak deals piercing damage instead of slashing damage. The creature is friendly to you and your companionsa445 and it can be used as a mount. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the diatryma defends itself but takes no other actions.

Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power: Bronze Gryphon
Description: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the command word and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of youa445 the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objectsa445 or if there isn't enough space for the creaturea445 the figurine doesn't become a creature.a446The creature is friendly to you and your companions. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.a446The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine againa445 its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passeda445 as specified in the figurine's description.a446Bronze Griffon.a446This bronze statuette is of a griffon rampant. It can become a griffon for up to 6 hours. Once it has been useda445 it can't be used again until 5 days have passed.

Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power: Ebony Fly
Description: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the command word and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of youa445 the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objectsa445 or if there isn't enough space for the creaturea445 the figurine doesn't become a creature.a446The creature is friendly to you and your companions. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.a446The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine againa445 its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passeda445 as specified in the figurine's description.a446Ebony Fly.a446This ebony statuette is carved in the likeness of a horsefly. It can become a giant fly for up to 12 hours and can be ridden as a mount. Once it has been useda445 it can't be used again until 2 days have passed.

Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power: Golden Lion
Description: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the command word and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of youa445 the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objectsa445 or if there isn't enough space for the creaturea445 the figurine doesn't become a creature.a446The creature is friendly to you and your companions. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.a446The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine againa445 its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passeda445 as specified in the figurine's description.a446Golden Lions.a446These gold statuettes of lions are always created in pairs. You can use one figurine or both simultaneously. Each can become a lion for up to 1 hour. Once a lion has been useda445 it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.

Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power: Ivory Goat (Terror)
Description: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the command word and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of youa445 the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objectsa445 or if there isn't enough space for the creaturea445 the figurine doesn't become a creature.a446The creature is friendly to you and your companions. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.a446The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine againa445 its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passeda445 as specified in the figurine's description.a446Ivory Goats.a446These ivory statuettes of goats are always created in sets of three. Each goat looks unique and functions differently from the others. Their properties are as follows:a446The goat of traveling can become a Large goat with the same statistics as a riding horse. It has 24 chargesa445 and each hour or portion thereof it spends in beast form costs 1 charge. While it has chargesa445 you can use it as often as you wish. When it runs out of chargesa445 it reverts to a figurine and can't be used again until 7 days have passeda445 when it regains all its charges.a446The goat of travail becomes a giant goat for up to 3 hours. Once it has been useda445 it can't be used again until 30 days have passed.a446The goat of terror becomes a giant goat for up to 3 hours. The goat can't attacka445 but you can remove its horns and use them as weapons. One horn becomes a +1 lancea445 and the other becomes a +2 longsword. Removing a horn requires an actiona445 and the weapons disappear and the horns return when the goat reverts to figurine form. In additiona445 the goat radiates a 30-foot-radius aura of terror while you are riding it. Any creature hostile to you that starts its turn in the aura must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the goat for 1 minutea445 or until the goat reverts to figurine form. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turnsa445 ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it successfully saves against the effecta445 a creature is immune to the goat's aura for the next 24 hours. Once the figurine has been useda445 it can't be used again until 15 days have passed.

Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power: Ivory Goat (Travail)
Description: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the command word and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of youa445 the figurine becomes a living creature. It has 24 chargesa445 and each hour or portion thereof it spends in beast form costs 1 charge. While it has chargesa445 you can use it as often as you wish. Once it has been useda445 it can't be used again until 30 days have passed.a446The goat of terror becomes a giant goat for up to 3 hours. The goat can't attacka445 but you can remove its horns and use them as weapons. One horn becomes a +1 lancea445 and the other becomes a +2 longsword. Removing a horn requires an actiona445 and the weapons disappear and the horns return when the goat reverts to figurine form. In additiona445 the goat radiates a 30-foot-radius aura of terror while you are riding it. Any creature hostile to you that starts its turn in the aura must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the goat for 1 minutea445 or until the goat reverts to figurine form. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turnsa445 ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it successfully saves against the effecta445 a creature is immune to the goat's aura for the next 24 hours. Once the figurine has been useda445 it can't be used again until 15 days have passed.

Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power: Ivory Goat (Travelling)
Description: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the command word and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of youa445 the figurine becomes a living creature. In additiona445 the goat radiates a 30-foot-radius aura of terror while you are riding it. Any creature hostile to you that starts its turn in the aura must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the goat for 1 minutea445 or until the goat reverts to figurine form. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turnsa445 ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it successfully saves against the effecta445 a creature is immune to the goat's aura for the next 24 hours. Once the figurine has been useda445 it can't be used again until 15 days have passed.

Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power: Marble Elephant
Description: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the command word and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of youa445 the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objectsa445 or if there isn't enough space for the creaturea445 the figurine doesn't become a creature.a446The creature is friendly to you and your companions. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.a446The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine againa445 its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passeda445 as specified in the figurine's description.a446Marble Elephant.a446This marble statuette is about 4 inches high and long. It can become an elephant for up to 24 hours. Once it has been useda445 it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.

Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power: Onyx Dog
Description: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the command word and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of youa445 the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objectsa445 or if there isn't enough space for the creaturea445 the figurine doesn't become a creature.a446The creature is friendly to you and your companions. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.a446The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine againa445 its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passeda445 as specified in the figurine's description.a446Onyx Dog.a446This onyx statuette of a dog can become a mastiff for up to 6 hours. The mastiff has an Intelligence of 8 and can speak Common. It also has dark vision out to a range of 60 feet and can see invisible creatures and objects within that range. Once it has been useda445 it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.

Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power: Serpentine Owl
Description: A figurine of wondrous power is a statuette of a beast small enough to fit in a pocket. If you use an action to speak the command word and throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of youa445 the figurine becomes a living creature. If the space where the creature would appear is occupied by other creatures or objectsa445 or if there isn't enough space for the creaturea445 the figurine doesn't become a creature.a446The creature is friendly to you and your companions. It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the creature defends itself but takes no other actions.a446The creature exists for a duration specific to each figurine. At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its figurine form. It reverts to a figurine early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine againa445 its property can't be used again until a certain amount of time has passeda445 as specified in the figurine's description.a446Serpentine Owl.a446This serpentine statuette of an owl can become a giant owl for up to 8 hours. Once it has been useda445 it can't be used again until 2 days have passed. The owl can telepathically communicate with you at any range if you and it are on the same plane of existence.

Name: Folding Boat
Description: This object appears as a wooden box that measures 12 inches longa445 6 inches widea445 and 6 inches deep. It weighs 4 pounds and floats. It can be opened to store items inside. This item also has three command wordsa445 each requiring you to use an action to speak it.a446One command word causes the box to unfold into a boat 10 feet longa445 4 feet widea445 and 2 feet deep. The boat has one pair of oarsa445 an anchora445 a masta445 and a lateen sail. The boat can hold up to four Medium creatures comfortably.a446The second command word causes the box to unfold into a ship 24 feet longa445 8 feet wide; and 6 feet deep. The ship has a decka445 rowing seatsa445 five sets of oarsa445 a steering oara445 an anchora445 a deck cabina445 and a mast with a square sail. The ship can hold fifteen Medium creatures comfortably.a446When the box becomes a vessela445 its weight becomes that of a normal vessel its sizea445 and anything that was stored in the box remains in the boat.a446The third command word causes the folding boat to fold back into a boxa445 provided that no creatures are aboard. Any objects in the vessel that can't fit inside the box remain outside the box as it folds. Any objects in the vessel that can fit inside the box do so.

Name: Gavel of the Venn Rune
Description: This wooden gavel is small by giant reckoning but nearly the size of a warhammer in human hands. The venn (friend) rune is inscribed in mithral in the base of the haft. Among giantsa445 this item is used as part of rituals to resolve disputes. The gavel has the following properties.a446Arbiters Shield. At the start of every combata445 attack rolls against you have disadvantage before the start of your first turna445 provided that the gavel is on your person.a446Bond of Amity. As an actiona445 you can use the gavel to strike a point on a hard surface. The first time in the next minute that a creature within 60 feet of that point deals damage to another creature with an attack that hitsa445 the attacker takes psychic damage equal to half the damage it dealt to the target. Once you use this propertya445 you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.a446Gift of Truth. You can transfer the gavel's magic to a place by tracing the venn rune on the ground with your finger. The point where you trace it becomes the center of a spherical area of magic that has a 30-foot radius and that is fixed to the place. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the gavel to be within 5 feet of you. At the enda445 the gavel is destroyeda445 and the area gains the following property:a446Whenever a creature utters a lie while within the 30-foot-radius spherea445 that creature takes 5 psychic damage and flinches visibly.

Name: Gem of Seeing
Description: This gem has 3 charges. As an actiona445 you can speak the gem's command word and expend 1 charge. For the next 10 minutesa445 you have truesight out to 120 feet when you peer through the gem.a446The gem regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.

Name: Ghost Lantern
Description: A restless spirit is trapped inside this lantern. While holding the lanterna445 you can command the spirit as a bonus action to shed bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.a446While holding the lanterna445 you can use an action to order the spirit to leave the lantern and duplicate the effect of the mage hand spell. The spirit returns to the lantern when the spell ends.a446If you fall unconscious within 10 feet of the lanterna445 the spirit emerges from ita445 magically stabilizes you with a toucha445 and then quickly returns to the lantern.a446The spirit is bound to the lantern and can't be harmeda445 turneda445 or raised from the dead.a446Casting a dispel evil and good spell on the lantern releases the spirit to the afterlife and renders the lantern nonmagical.

Name: Gruul Keyrune
Description: This crude keyrune is cobbled together from bits of rubblea445 broken glassa445 bonea445 and animal hair. One end resembles a horned beast. On commanda445 the keyrune transforms into a ceratoka445 a horned creature much like a rhinoceros (and with the same statistics). It remains in its ceratok form for 1 hour.a446When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of youa445 the keyrune transforms into a ceratok. If there isn't enough space for the creaturea445 the keyrune doesn't transform.a446The creature is friendly to youa445 your companionsa445 and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the creature takes the Dodge action and moves to avoid danger.a446At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune forma445 it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

Name: Heward’s Handy Haversack
Description: This backpack has a central pouch and two side pouchesa445 each of which is an extradimensional space. Each side pouch can hold up to 20 pounds of materiala445 not exceeding a volume of 2 cubic feet. The large central pouch can hold up to 8 cubic feet or 80 pounds of material. The backpack always weighs 5 poundsa445 regardless of its contents.a446Placing an object in the haversack follows the normal rules for interacting with objects. Retrieving an item from the haversack requires you to use an action. When you reach into the haversack for a specific itema445 the item is always magically on top.a446The haversack has a few limitations. If it is overloadeda445 or if a sharp object pierces it or tears ita445 the haversack ruptures and is destroyed. If the haversack is destroyeda445 its contents are lost forevera445 although an artifact always turns up again somewhere. If the haversack is turned inside outa445 its contents spill fortha445 unharmeda445 and the haversack must be put right before it can be used again. If a breathing creature is placed within the haversacka445 the creature can survive for up to 10 minutesa445 after which time it begins to suffocate.a446Placing the haversack inside an extradimensional space created by a bag of holdinga445 portable holea445 or similar item instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the Astral Plane. The gate originates where the one item was placed inside the other. Any creature within 10-feet of the gate is sucked through it and deposited in a random location on the Astral Plane. The gate then closes. The gate is one-way only and can't be reopened.

Name: Horn of Blasting
Description: You can use an action to speak the horn's command word and then blow the horna445 which emits a thunderous blast in a 30-foot cone that is audible 600 feet away. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed savea445 a creature takes 5d6 thunder damage and is deafened for 1 minute. On a successful savea445 a creature takes half as much damage and isn't deafened. Creatures and objects made of glass or crystal have disadvantage on the saving throw and take 10d6 thunder damage instead of 5d6.a446Each use of the horn's magic has a 20 percent chance of causing the horn to explode. The explosion deals 10d6 fire damage to the blower and destroys the horn.

Name: Brass Horn of Valhalla
Description: You can use an action to blow this horn. In responsea445 warrior spirits from the plane of Ysgard appear within 60 feet of you. These spirits use the berserker statistics. They return to Ysgard after 1 hour or when they drop to 0 hit points. Once you use the horna445 it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.a446A brass horn summons 3d4 + 3 berserkers. To use the brass horna445 you must be proficient with all simple weapons.a446If you blow the horn without meeting its requirementa445 the summoned berserkers attack you. If you meet the requirementa445 they are friendly to you and your companions and follow your commands.

Name: Silver Horn of Valhalla
Description: You can use an action to blow this horn. In responsea445 warrior spirits from the plane of Ysgard appear within 60 feet of you. These spirits use the berserker statistics. They return to Ysgard after 1 hour or when they drop to 0 hit points. Once you use the horna445 it can't be used again until 7 days have passed.a446The silver horn summons 2d4 + 2 berserkers.a446The berserkers are friendly to you and your companions and follow your commands.

Name: Horseshoes of Speed
Description: These iron horseshoes come in a set of four. While all four shoes are affixed to the hooves of a horse or similar creaturea445 they increase the creature's walking speed by 30 feet.

Name: Instrument of the Bard – Canaith Mandolin
Description: An instrument of the bards is an exquisite example of its kinda445 superior to an ordinary instrument in every way. Seven types of these instruments exista445 each named after a legendary bard college. A creature that attempts to play the instrument without being attuned to it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 2d4 psychic damage.a446You can use an action to play the instrument and cast one of its spells. Once the instrument has been used to cast a spella445 it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn. The spells use your spellcasting ability and spell save DC.a446You can play the instrument while casting a spell that causes any of its targets to be charmed on a failed saving throwa445 thereby imposing disadvantage on the save. This effect applies only if the spell has a somatic or a material component.a446All instruments of the bards can be used to cast the following spells: flya445 invisibilitya445 levitatea445 and protection from evil and good.a446In additiona445 the Canaith mandolin can be used to cast cure wounds (3rd level)a445 dispel magica445 and protection from energy (lightning only).a446If you have proficiency with a given musical instrumenta445 you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument.a446A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focusa445 substituting it for any material component that does not list a cost.a446Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.a446See the Tool Proficiencies entry for more information.a446Proficiency with a musical instrument indicates you are familiar with the techniques used to play it. You also have knowledge of some songs commonly performed with that instrument.a446History. Your expertise aids you in recalling lore related to your instrument.a446Performance. Your ability to put on a good show is improved when you incorporate an instrument into your act.a446Compose a Tune. As part of a long resta445 you can compose a new tune and lyrics for your instrument. You might use this ability to impress a noble or spread scandalous rumors with a catchy tune.a446Musical Instrumenta446Activity        DCa446Identify a tune        10a446Improvise a tune        20

Name: Instrument of the Bard – Cli Lyre
Description: An instrument of the bards is an exquisite example of its kinda445 superior to an ordinary instrument in every way. Seven types of these instruments exista445 each named after a legendary bard college. A creature that attempts to play the instrument without being attuned to it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 2d4 psychic damage.a446You can use an action to play the instrument and cast one of its spells. Once the instrument has been used to cast a spella445 it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn. The spells use your spellcasting ability and spell save DC.a446You can play the instrument while casting a spell that causes any of its targets to be charmed on a failed saving throwa445 thereby imposing disadvantage on the save. This effect applies only if the spell has a somatic or a material component.a446All instruments of the bards can be used to cast the following spells: flya445 invisibilitya445 levitatea445 and protection from evil and good.a446In additiona445 the Cli lyre can be used to cast stone shapea445 wall of firea445 and wind wall.a446If you have proficiency with a given musical instrumenta445 you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument.a446A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focusa445 substituting it for any material component that does not list a cost.a446Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.a446See the Tool Proficiencies entry for more information.a446Proficiency with a musical instrument indicates you are familiar with the techniques used to play it. You also have knowledge of some songs commonly performed with that instrument.a446History. Your expertise aids you in recalling lore related to your instrument.a446Performance. Your ability to put on a good show is improved when you incorporate an instrument into your act.a446Compose a Tune. As part of a long resta445 you can compose a new tune and lyrics for your instrument. You might use this ability to impress a noble or spread scandalous rumors with a catchy tune.a446Musical Instrumenta446Activity        DCa446Identify a tune        10a446Improvise a tune        20

Name: Iron Bands of Bilarro
Description: This rusty iron sphere measures 3 inches in diameter and weighs 1 pound. You can use an action to speak the command word and throw the sphere at a Huge or smaller creature you can see within 60 feet of you. As the sphere moves through the aira445 it opens into a tangle of metal bands.a446Make a ranged attack roll with an attack bonus equal to your Dexterity modifier plus your proficiency bonus. On a hita445 the target is restrained until you take a bonus action to speak the command word again to release it. Doing soa445 or missing with the attacka445 causes the bands to contract and become a sphere once more.a446A creaturea445 including the one restraineda445 can use an action to make a DC 20 Strength check to break the iron bands. On a successa445 the item is destroyeda445 and the restrained creature is freed. If the check failsa445 any further attempts made by that creature automatically fail until 24 hours have elapsed.a446Once the bands are useda445 they can't be used again until the next dawn.

Name: Izzet Keyrune
Description: Formed of carved and polished red and blue stonea445 the keyrune includes bits of cable and wire. One end resembles a humanlike heada445 suggesting the jagged elemental form of the galvanice weird that it can become for a duration of 3 hours. In this forma445 it will serve you as a bodyguarda445 lift and carry things for youa445 act as a test subject for your experimentsa445 or aid you in any other way that its capabilities allow.a446When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of youa445 the keyrune transforms into a galvanice weird. If there isn't enough space for the creaturea445 the keyrune doesn't transform.a446The creature is friendly to youa445 your companionsa445 and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the creature takes the Dodge action and moves to avoid danger.a446At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune forma445 it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

Name: Loadstone
Description: This stone is a large gem worth 150 gp.a446Curse. The stone is curseda445 but its magical nature is hidden; detect magic doesn't detect it. An identify spell reveals the stone's true nature. If you use the Dash or Disengage action while the stone is on your persona445 its curse activates. Until the curse is broken with remove curse or similar magica445 your speed is reduced by 5 feeta445 and your maximum load and maximum lift capacities are halved. You also become unwilling to part with the stone.

Name: Mirror of the Past
Description: The holder of this platinum hand mirror can learn something about the history of a specific object or creature by taking an action to gaze into the mirror and think of the target. Instead of the holder's reflectiona445 the mirror presents scenes from the target's past. Information conveyed is accuratea445 but it is random and cryptica445 and presented in no particular order. Once it is activateda445 the mirror gives its information for 1 minute or lessa445 then returns to normal. It can't be used again until the next dawn.

Name: Mizzium Mortar
Description: This short tubea445 about 2 feet long and 6 inches in diametera445 is made from mizziuma445 a magically enhanced metal alloy forged by the Izzet League. The end that's pointed toward a target is opena445 and a glowing ball of molten metal can be seen at the other end as long as the mortar has at least 1 charge remaining.a446The mortar has 4 charges for the following properties. It regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn.a446Molten Spray. You can expend 1 charge as an action to loose a 30-foot cone of molten mizzium. Each creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throwa445 taking 5d4 fire damage on a failed savea445 or half as much damage on a successful one.a446Mizzium Bombard. You can expend 3 charges as an action to launch a hail of molten projectiles in a 20-foot-radiusa445 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point you can see within 60 feet of you. Each creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 5d8 fire damage on a failed savea445 or half as much damage on a successful one.

Name: Orb of the Stein Rune
Description: This orb of granite is about the size of an adult human's fist. The stein (stone) rune appears on it in the form of crystalline veins that run across the surface. The orb has the following propertiesa445 which work only while it's on your person.a446Indomitable Stand. As an actiona445 you can channel the orb's magic to hold your ground. For the next minute or until you move any distancea445 you have advantage on all checks and saving throws to resist effects that force you to move. In additiona445 any enemy that moves to a space within 10 feet of you must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be unable to move any farther this turn.a446Stone Soul. You can't be petrified.a446Earthen Step. You can cast meld into stone as a bonus action. Once you use this propertya445 you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.a446Gift of Stone. You can transfer the orb's magic to a nonmagical item—a shield or a pair of boots—by tracing the stein rune there with your finger. The transfer takes 8 hours of work that requires the two items to be within 5 feet of each other. At the enda445 the orb is destroyeda445 and the rune appears in silver on the chosen itema445 which gains a benefit based on its form:a446Shield. The shield is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While you wield ita445 you have resistance to all damage dealt by ranged weapon attacks.a446Boots. The pair of boots is now an uncommon magic item that requires attunement. While you wear the bootsa445 you have advantage on Strength saving throwsa445 and you can use your reaction to avoid being knocked prone.

Name: Orzhov Keyrune
Description: This keyrune is carved from white marble with veins of black. The end is shaped like a thrull's heada445 with a gold faceplate affixed. On commanda445 the keyrune transforms into a winged thrull for up to 2 hours. If you don't come from an Orzhov oligarch familya445 it serves you grudginglya445 clownishly aping your movements and mannerisms while carrying out your orders.a446When you use an action to speak the item's command word and place the keyrune on the ground in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of youa445 the keyrune transforms into a winged thrull. If there isn't enough space for the creaturea445 the keyrune doesn't transform.a446The creature is friendly to youa445 your companionsa445 and other members of your guild (unless those guild members are hostile to you). It understands your languages and obeys your spoken commands. If you issue no commandsa445 the creature takes the Dodge action and moves to avoid danger.a446At the end of the durationa445 the creature reverts to its keyrune form. It reverts early if it drops to 0 hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature reverts to its keyrune forma445 it can't transform again until 36 hours have passed.

Name: Portable Hole
Description: This fine black clotha445 soft as silka445 is folded up to the dimensions of a handkerchief. It unfolds into a circular sheet 6 feet in diameter.a446You can use an action to unfold a portable hole and place it on or against a solid surfacea445 whereupon the portable hole creates an extradimensional hole 10 feet deep. The cylindrical space within the hole exists on a different planea445 so it can't be used to create open passages. Any creature inside an open portable hole can exit the hole by climbing out of it.a446You can use an action to close a portable hole by taking hold of the edges of the cloth and folding it up. Folding the cloth closes the holea445 and any creatures or objects within remain in the extradimensional space. No matter what's in ita445 the hole weighs next to nothing.a446If the hole is folded upa445 a creature within the hole's extradimensional space can use an action to make a DC 10 Strength check. On a successful checka445 the creature forces its way out and appears within 5 feet of the portable hole or the creature carrying it. A breathing creature within a closed portable hole can survive for up to 10 minutesa445 after which time it begins to suffocate.a446Placing a portable hole inside an extradimensional space created by a bag of holdinga445 Heward's handy haversacka445 or similar item instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the Astral Plane. The gate originates where the one item was placed inside the other. Any creature within 10 feet of the gate is sucked through it and deposited in a random location on the Astral Plane. The gate then closes. The gate is one-way only and can't be reopened.

Name: Quaal’s Feather Token – Anchor
Description: This tiny object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exista445 each with a different single-use effect.a446Anchor. You can use an action to touch the token to a boat or ship. For the next 24 hoursa445 the vessel can't be moved by any means. Touching the token to the vessel again ends the effect. When the effect endsa445 the token disappears.

Name: Quaal’s Feather Token – Bird
Description: This tiny object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exista445 each with a different single-use effect.a446Bird. You can use an action to toss the token 5 feet into the air. The token disappears and an enormousa445 multicolored bird takes its place. The bird has the statistics of a roca445 but it obeys your simple commands and can't attack. It can carry up to 500 pounds while flying at its maximum speed (16 miles an hour for a maximum of 144 miles per day. with a one-hour rest for every 3 hours of flying)a445 or 1a445000 pounds at half that speed. The bird disappears after flying its maximum distance for a day or if it drops to 0 hit points. You can dismiss the bird as an action.

Name: Quaal’s Feather Token – Fan
Description: This tiny object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exista445 each with a different single-use effect.a446Fan. If you are on a boat or shipa445 you can use an action to toss the token up to 10 feet in the air. The token disappearsa445 and a giant flapping fan takes its place. The fan floats and creates a wind strong enough to fill the sails of one shipa445 increasing its speed by 5 miles per hour for 8 hours. You can dismiss the fan as an action.

Name: Quaal’s Feather Token – Swan Boat
Description: This tiny object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exista445 each with a different single-use effect.a446Swan Boat. You can use an action to touch the token to a body of water at least 60 feet in diameter. The token disappearsa445 and a 50-foot-longa445 20-foot-wide boat shaped like a swan takes its place. The boat is self-propelled and moves across water at a speed of 6 miles per hour. You can use an action while on the boat to command it to move or to turn up to 90 degrees. The boat can carry up to thirty-two Medium or smaller creatures. A Large creature counts as four Medium creaturesa445 while a Huge creature counts as nine. The boat remains for 24 hours and then disappears. You can dismiss the boat as an action.

Name: Quaal’s Feather Token – Whip
Description: This tiny object looks like a feather. Different types of feather tokens exista445 each with a different single-use effect.a446Whip. You can use an action to throw the token to a point within 10 feet of you. The token disappearsa445 and a floating whip takes its place. You can then use a bonus action to make a melee spell attack against a creature within 10 feet of the whipa445 with an attack bonus of +9. On a hita445 the target takes 1d6 + 5 force damage.a446As a bonus action on your turna445 you can direct the whip to fly up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 10 feet of it. The whip disappears after 1 houra445 when you use an action to dismiss ita445 or when you are incapacitated or die.

Name: Rope of Entanglement
Description: This rope is 30 feet long and weighs 3 pounds. If you hold one end of the rope and use an action to speak its command worda445 the other end darts forward to entangle a creature you can see within 20 feet of you. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or become restrained.a446You can release the creature by using a bonus action to speak a second command word. A target restrained by the rope can use an action to make a DC 15 Strength or Dexterity check (target's choice). On a successa445 the creature is no longer restrained by the rope.a446The rope has AC 20 and 20 hit points. It regains 1 hit point every 5 minutes as long as it has at least 1 hit point. If the rope drops to 0 hit pointsa445 it is destroyed.

Name: Selesnya Keyrune
Description: Carved from white and green marble in the shape of a wolf's heada445 this keyrune transforms into a dire wolf. The wolf persists for 8 hours. Its Intelligence is 6a445 and it understands Elvish and Sylvan but can't speak those languages.
